śāstreti | śāstramātraprasiddhānāmāhatyapratītyajananena vivakṣitavākyārthapratyayapariskhalanaṃ khedadāyī nānāmṛduduṣṭatābījam | yadi tu kutaścidviśeṣājjhaṭityeva pratītiṃ janayettadā kathaṃ doṣaḥ | asti ca pratipattivyutpattyatiśayalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ | tadidamuktam—tadvidyeti | mantraṇādyavasare aucitīvaśāttattatpadānāṃ guṇatvamapi nirvahati | śāstraprakiyāpekṣitvaṃ gāmbhīryam | śāstravyavahārasaṃketitapadānāṃ guṇatvamityanyaḥ prakāraḥ | yathāvadviniyogaḥ kāryastasya prakārasākalyaṃ śarīram, śabdacchalātkāyaḥ, ātmā sārabhūtaḥ kṣetrajñaśca | karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ puruṣadravyasaṃpaddeśakālavibhāgo vinipātapratīkāraḥ kāryasiddhiriti pañcāṅgāni | rūpaṃ saṃjñā saṃskāro vedanā vijñānamiti pañca skandhāḥ ||
arthapratītikṛddūre kliṣṭaṃ nāma yaducyate |
jhaṭityarthapratītau tadguṇatvamanugacchati || 98 ||
yathā—
‘athātmanaḥ śabdaguṇaṃ guṇajñaḥ padaṃ vimānena vigāhamānaḥ |
pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamutpatantī kāñcīguṇasthānamaninditayāḥ || 132 ||’
atrātmanā padaṃ śabdaguṇamiti pituḥ padaṃ madhyamamiti cākāśaviṣayā kāñcīguṇasthānaṃ nitambaviṣayamiti sarvaprasiddherjhaṭityeva pratītiṃ karotīti kliṣṭasyāsya guṇatvam ||
arthapratītikṛditi | ihāpi tadeva dūṣaṇatābījaṃ jhaṭiti pratītijanane sati samādhīyate | samādhānopāyaśca padāntarasaṃnidhānamatiprasiddhiḥ prakaraṇaṃ vā | tathā hi—prakṛtodāhaऱṇe uttarārdhe harirityabhidhānādātmanaḥ padamiti hareḥ padamiti saṃpannam, asya ca sāmānyaśabdatvādākāśaviṣayā pratītiryadyapi jhaṭiti notpattumarhati, tathāpi śabdaguṇamiti viśeṣaṇena padārthāntarādyavacchidya vivakṣitābhimukhī pratītirupajanyate | pituḥ padamiti | yadyapi padamiti sāmānyaṃ tathāpyākāśasyaiva madhyamacaraṇavinyāsasthānatvena prasiddherna tathocitapratītivyavadhānam | kāñcīguṇasthānamiti | caraṇādārabhya varṇanākrame nitamba eva kāñcīniveśanasyocitatvānna pratī-
tivyavadhānam | tadidamudāharaṇatrayaprayojanamudāharaṇāderaneko 'tra vākyārtho gaveṣaṇīyaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi sarvaprasiddheriti bravīti | itthaṃ śabdaguṇaśabdasya bahuvrīhitvādavaśyaṃ viśeṣaparyavasānāya prasiddhiranusaraṇīyā | avaśyaṃ na varṇanakrame 'pi kāñcīguṇasthānamaninditāyā ityatra kāñcīguṇasthānaśabdasya nitambaviśeṣaparyavasānārthaṃ kavīnāmaucityaprasiddhiraṅgīkartavyeti | nanu cātmanaḥ padaṃ śabdaguṇatvamityatra prasādaḥ kasmānna bhavati | evamāha na bhavatīti | udāharaṇasyādūṣaṇatvātsāmānyaśabdasya viśeṣaparyavasānam, anyacca samabhivyāhṛtapadārthasaṃsargarūpe vākyārthe svacchasalila ivābhimataviśeṣapratibimbanamityupādhidvayasya saṃkarācca ||
aprasiddhārthasaṃbandhaṃ yadgụ̄dhārthamiti smṛtam |
tavdyākhyānādiṣu prāyo guṇatvena tadiṣyate || 99 ||
yathā—
‘amhārisā vi kaïṇo kaïṇo ‘anda’ (canda)’ kha gahalibụdhḍhasālipamuhā vi |
maṇḍukkamakkaḍā vi hu honti harīsappasiṃhā vi || 133 ||’
[asmādṛśā api kavayaḥ kavayo harivṛddhaśālipramukhā api |
maṇḍūkamarkaṭā api khalu bhavanti harisarpasiṃhā api ||]
atra maṇḍūkamarkaṭasarpasiṃheṣvaprasiddhaprayogatvādgūḍhasyāpi hariśabdasya svayaṃ vyākhyātatvādguṇatvam ||
aprasiddhārthasaṃvandhamiti | tasya guṇārthasya vyākhyānaṃ tavdyākhyānam | atrāpyatiprasidhdyākṛṣṭasyānatiprasiddhārthapratītyakaraṇaṃ duṣṭatābījamabhidhānīyam, tattu pratītiparyavasānādeva nivartate | bhavati cābhidhānakopa iva vyākhyāne jhaṭiti pratyayaḥ | asmādṛśā api mandapratibhānāḥ kavayaḥ kaviśabdavācyā harivṛddhaśālipramukhāśca lokottarapratibhāśālinastadavayavatāṃ vikhyāte cāvikhyāte ca śabdāḥ sādhāraṇā bhavanti | tadyathā—hariśabda eveti vyākhyānam | tato doṣatvābhāvaḥ prativastulakṣaṇālaṃkāraparyavasāyitayā ca prakṛtārthānuguṇatvena guṇatvalābhaḥ | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—svayaṃ vyākhyātatvāddoṣābhāvo guṇatvaṃ punarābhiprāyikātprakṛtānuguṇabhāvāditi boddhavyam ||
neyārthaṃ yatsvasaṃketaklṛptavācyaṃ ‘tadīritam’ ka-khanirūpitam |
prahelikādiṣu prājñaistadguṇatvena gaṇyate || 100 ||
yathā—
‘moru kalāveṇa vahaï taha ṇāmaha sariṇāu |
ussīsā pāantigao aṇuṇattirhi jaṇu ṇāu || 134 ||’
[mayūraḥ kalāpena vahati tasya nāmnaḥ sadṛśanāmā |
ucchīrṣātpādāntagato 'nunaktaṃ yathā naukā ||]
atra mayūrabarhacandrakasaṃketena kalpitasya candranāmno neyārthatve 'pi prahelikātvādguṇatvam ||
neyārthamiti | atrāpi pūrvavadeva vāsanā | ākīrṇāmantraṇādau vidagdhānāṃ lakṣaṇādayaḥ prahelikāviśeṣānunmīlayanta upayujyante | tathā hi—mayūreti | 'jianāu’ iti pāṭhe jitanauka iti sa evārthaḥ | mayūro barhabhāre candrakaṃ vahati | anena saṃketena candranāma labhyate | saṃviṣṭasya śirodeśa ucchīrṣam, caraṇadeśaḥ pādāntaḥ | ucchīrṣeṇa prācī diglakṣyate | ‘prākśirāḥ śayīta’ iti vacanāt | arthātpādāntena pratīcī | tataśca ‘prācyāḥ pratīcimardhacandro gataḥ’ iti prātaḥkālodbhedo vākyārthaḥ | ‘aṇuṇenti ajiṇaṇāu’ iti pāṭhe subhagamāninaṃ kāntamanunayantyā mayā jñāta hati khaṇḍitakāminīkhedoktiḥ | na caitāsāṃ lakṣaṇānāmasti kiṃcitprayojanamiti neyārthatvaprasaktau prahelikābhāva eva samādhānahetuḥ | nanu cocchīrṣapādāntarapadayorastu, mayūrakalāpa ityādau tu katham | yamiti hi sarvanāmābhimatameva tāvadupasthāpayati | barhe bahūnāṃ bahule kathamekasya pratītirityabhidhāne 'pi kadācitkliṣṭasya viśeṣaguṇaḥ syāt | nātra neyārthatā, kiṃ tu tena saṃketena kalpitasya candranāmna iti | tasya nāmnaḥ sadṛśanāmetyanena mukhyavṛttyaiva vivakṣitasadṛśalābhāditi | atredaṃ vaktavyam—tasya nāmna ityanena candrakapadamupasthāpitam, na ca tena sahāsti candrapadasya sādṛś‍yamiti | tatra lakṣaṇāśrayaṇīyā | tadidamuktaṃ candrasaṃketena kalpitasya candranāmna iti | upalakṣaṇatayā ca ekadeśavyākhyānam ||
yadaniścayakṛtproktaṃ saṃdigdhaṃ tadguṇī bhavet |
bhavedviśeṣāvagamo yadi prakaraṇādibhiḥ || 101 ||
yathā—
‘mahībhṛtaḥ putravato 'pi dṛṣṭistasminnapatye na jagāma tṛptim |
sa śārṅgacakrāsigadābjapāṇirmeghacchaviḥ pātu jaganti śauriḥ || 135 ||’
atra tasminnapatye ityaniścitasyāpyapatyaviśeṣasya saṃdigdhatve 'pi gauryāmiti prakaraṇena gamyate | meghacchavirityasya ca navaś‍yāmādipadānupādāne 'pi śaurisaṃbaddhatvānnavameghacchavirmeghaś‍yāmacchaviriti vā viśeṣo niścīyata iti tasyāpi guṇatvam ||
yaditi | saṃśāyakajātīyasya saṃdehajanakatvaṃ nāma dūṣakatābījam | tadyadikutaścidviśeṣādvivakṣitapratītirapratyūhamupapadyate tadā bhavatyeva doṣābhāvaḥ | viśeṣāvagamo viśeṣadarśanaṃ tasyaiva saṃśayavirodhitvāt | mahībhṛta ityādāvapatyaśabdo yadyapi gaurīśabdo 'pi taditaradattapada iti saṃśāyakajātīyo bhavati, tathāpi tacchabdopasthāpita eva vivakṣitaviśeṣe paryavasyannapajahāti doṣatvam | tacchabda eva kathaṃ tamarthamupanayatītyatra tu prakaraṇameva jāgradavasthamasti | meghacchavirityatra tu yadyapi meghapadaṃ ś‍yāmāś‍yāmadattapadatayā saṃśāyakajātīyam, tathāpi prasiddhapadanīlavarṇārthagaurīpadasamabhivyāhārācchabdāntarasaṃnidhirapi viśeṣe niyamayati tadvā chavipadaṃ vā viśeṣe paryavasyati | atra prakaraṇādīnāṃ viśeṣasmṛtihetutvāt | ata eva sūtre bahuvacanādipadānupādānādanupāttāstadetadabhisaṃdhāya vyācaṣṭe—atretyādi | evaṃ navameghacchaviriti cokte yathā niyamenārthapratītirapratyūhā bhavati tathā meghacchavirityukta iti | ata eva kavisamayaprasiddhaviśeṣāvagamasāmagrīsaṃpādanena guṇatvamiti | kathaṃ punaridaṃ kliṣṭasya vaiśeṣikaṃ na bhavati ko vākyabhūtena bhavati | kiṃ tu saṃśāyakatvamāpādayataḥ pratibhāso 'pyuktayuktyā nivartata ityabhimatam | na caivaṃrūpatā kliṣṭavaiśeṣike saṃbhavati | ekasyaiva citrapadasya saṃśayaśaktiriti na vākyārthagāmitā ||
yattadviruddhamityuktaṃ viparītaprakalpanam |
tathābhūtābhidhānena guṇatvaṃ pratipadyate || 102 ||
yathā—
‘abhidhāya tadā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo 'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ |
bhavato 'bhimanāḥ samīhate saruṣaḥ kartumupetya mānanām || 136 ||’
atra viparītārthakalpanaṃ viruddhatve 'pi saṃdhyarthavigrahārthayoḥ sphuṭabhinnārthatvenābhidhānādguṇatvam ||
yattaditi | evaṃ vastu prakṛtamabhisaṃdhāya vākyaracane tadupamardakavastvantarapraveśo virodhaḥ | yatra dve api vastunī prakṛte vastvantarameva vā prakṛtaṃ tadyathoktarūpābhāve kathaṃ doṣaḥ | tathā hi—abhidhāyetyādau dūtavākye saṃdhivigrahayormitho virodhinorapi vivakṣitaṃ sa doṣaḥ | saruṣaḥ sakrodhasya tava mānanāṃ pūjāṃ śiśupāla icchati | anuśayaḥ paścāttāpaḥ | abhimukhaṃ sotkaṇṭhaṃ mano yasya sa tatheti saṃdhipakṣe | vigrahapakṣe tvanuśayaḥ krodho bhavataḥ sakāśādabhi bhayaśūnyaṃ mano yasyeti nityasāpekṣatvātsamāsaḥ | saruṣo mānanā upayogastadiha nisṛṣṭārthasyobhayopanyāso yadrocate tadvidhīyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya racita iti guṇatvamityubhayavivakṣāpakṣe vyākhyānam | yadā tu śāsanaharo dūtastadodyateṣvapi śastreṣu yathoktavaktāro dūtā bhavantīti nyāyena vigraharthamevābhimataḥ vipakṣasyāpi prarocanā dūtakartavyeti mukhe saṃdhiḥ paryāyabhūto yukta eva | tadidaṃ vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atreti | saṃdhirūpo 'rthaḥ saṃdhyarthaḥ, vigraharūpo 'rtho vigrahārthaḥ | tayorabhidhānena sphuṭa eva bhinno 'rthaḥ prayojanam | pakṣadvaye 'pi yatprayojanamuktaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇaitavdyākhyānam ||
aprayojakamityuktamaviśeṣavidhāyakam |
svarūpamātre vaktavye tasyāpi guṇateṣyate || 103 ||
yathā—
‘‘te cā’ khate 'pyākāśamasiś‍yāmamutplutya paramarṣayaḥ |
sāgraṃ varṣasahasraṃ sa tapastepe mahāmanāḥ || 137 ||’
atrāsiś‍yāmamityākāśaṃ prati, sāgramityanena ca varṣasahasraṃ prati viśeṣānabhidhāne 'pi dūrotpatanaciratapaścaraṇayorupayogavivakṣāyāṃ guṇatvam ||
aprayojakamiti | tadeva kavibhirupādīyata iti yadabhipretasaṃdhimādhatte | yatra vākyārthapraviṣṭamapi na tathābhāvamāsādayati tadaprayojakamityuktam | tasya yadi viśeṣasvarūpābhidhāne paryavasānena prayogo na tarhi doṣaḥ | tathā hi—ākāśamityādau nātiś‍yāmatārūpaṃ viśeṣamākāśe kāṃcidapi viśeṣamātrāmunmudrayati, ākāśasya sarvadā tadrūpānapāyāt | evamasamagrasya sahasratvābhāvātsāgramityapi na viśeṣādhāyakam | ākāśasahasrayostu yadeva rūpabhāvedanīyamityatraitāvanmātrābhiprāyeṇa nāsti dūṣaṇam, tathāpi nāntarīyakayorabhidhāne kiṃ prayojanaṃ yenānayorguṇabhāvasaṃpattirityata āha—dūra iti | atidūre ś‍yāmatvamadhikaṃ pratibhāti | kṣaṇamātramapi na viratirāsīditi sāgrapadābhiprāyo 'ta eva nātra paunarukt‍yam | tarhi vākyārthe viśeṣādhāyakatvamevānayoriti kathaṃ dūṣaṇatvasaṃbhāvanā | ittham | yasminnanupādīyamāne 'pi nābhimatanyūnatā tatpadamaprayojakam | asti cātra dvayorapi tajjātīyatāyāṃ doṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ | sa prakṛtopayogavivakṣāyāmeva nivartate | sarvathā prakṛtānupayoge dūṣaṇatvānapāyitā | asti cātrocita evopayogo yo vivakṣitumarhatītyāha—vivakṣāyāmiti ||
yadavyutpattimaddeś‍yamiti pūrvaṃ nirūpitam |
mahākavinibaddhaṃ sattadapyatra guṇī bhavet || 104 ||
yathā—
‘ṣaṇḍeṣūddaṇḍapiṇḍītagarataralanāḥ prāpire yena velā-
mālambyottālatallasphuṭitapuṭakinībandhavo gandhavāhāḥ || 138 ||’
‘pātālapratimallagallavivaraprakṣiptasaptārṇavam || 139 ||’
‘kirantaḥ kāverīlaḍahalaharīśīkarakaṇān || 140 ||’
atra tallagallalaḍahalaharīprabhṛtīnāmavyutpattimattvenoddeś‍yatve 'pi mahākavibhiraṅgīkṛtatvādguṇatvam ||
yaditi | saṃdarbhacchāyāvaiṣamyamatra kaṣṭatābījamiti pūrvamuktaṃ tatra yadi samānacchāyaśabdamadhyaniveśanena pratikṣipyate tadā kathaṃ doṣaḥ | tathābhūtānāmeva padānāṃ saṃdarbhanirvāhakatayā mahākavinibaddhamiti | ata eva śabdagamakatayā guṇatvalābhaḥ | uddaṇḍatvena piṇḍītagarāṇāṃ kaṭhoratā | tādṛśānāmapi taralanena praụdhiḥ | uttāle-
tyādyanuprāsavatproḍhapadasajātīyameva tallapadam | evaṃ galletyādau boddhavyam | tadidamāha—atra tallagalletyādi ||
grāmyaṃ ghṛṇāvadaślīlāmaṅgalārthaṃ yadīritam |
tatsaṃvīteṣu gupteṣu lakṣiteṣu na duṣyati || 105 ||
tatra saṃvīte yathā—
‘tasmai himādreḥ prayatāṃ tanūjāṃ yatātmane yojayituṃ yatasva |
yoṣitsu tadvīryaniṣekabhūmiḥ saiva kṣametyātmabhuvopadiṣṭam || 141 ||’
atra tadvīryaniṣekabhūmirityaślīlasyāpi saṃvītatvādguṇatvam ||
yadāha—
‘saṃvītasya hi lokeṣu na doṣānveṣaṇaṃ kṣamam |
śivaliṅgasya saṃsthāne kasyāsabhyatvabhāvanā ||’
grāmyamiti | atra kecidyathāsaṃkhyaṃ vyācakṣate—ghṛṇāvadādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ krameṇa saṃkhyānagopanalakṣaṇāni doṣatvābhāvabījānīti, tadasat | ghṛṇāvadarthādimātra evāgre pratisaṃbhedatrikamupādāya saṃvyānāditrikasyopadarśanāt | etādṛśayathāsaṃkhyasūcanāyaiva lakṣaṇātikrameṇa ghṛṇāvataḥ prathamamupādānam | tasmātsaṃkhyānamiva saṃkhyānaṃ lokānumatiḥ | kiṃcitpadaṃ duṣṭajātīyamapi loke nopādānāttādrūpyaṃ jahātyeva | prāyeṇa lokānusāri kāvyadarśanaṃ bhavatyataḥ pratisvaṃ bhedatritayasaṃbandhādupapannaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ syādityabhidhāya pūrvakrameṇodāharati—atreti | etena saṃvīteṣvityādikaṃ bahuvacanaṃ vyākhyātam | yathā śivaliṅgasya saṃsthāna ityatra yadyapi mukhyavidhaiva śivaliṅgapadamślīla evārthe, tathāpyavigānenādiprayogayogitvānna vrīḍādānakṣamaṃ tathehāpi taddhīryeti | śivaliṅgetyatra bhagavatsaṃbandhaḥ prayojaka iti tu tulyamatrāpītyāha—taditi | atra hi jagadantaryāmiṇo bhagavatastadvirodhitayā prasiddhirupajīvyā tadupajīvane vrīḍādāyinī pratītiranutthāyinyeva | atraivācāryamataṃ likhati—saṃvītasya hīti | kasyāsabhyatveti | bhāvanā sakalalokasādhāraṇaṃ jñānam ||
gupte yathā—
‘sudumtyajā yadyapi janmabhūmirgajairasaṃbādhamayāṃbabhūve |
sa te 'nuneyaḥ subhago 'bhimānī bhaginyayaṃ naḥ prathamābhisaṃdhiḥ || 142 ||’
atra janmabhūmisaṃbādhasubhagabhaginīśabdānāmaślīlārthāntaratve 'pi prathamārthaprabhāvabhāvanāguptatvādguṇatvam ||
yadāha—
‘vastumāhātmyaguptasya padārthasya‘syāvibhāvanāt’ iti pāṭhaṣṭīkānusārī bhavet vibhāvanāt |
bhaginībhagavatyādi nāsabhyatvena bhāvyate ||’
yasya padasya vyutpattilabhyamarthāntaraṃ grāmyam, yasya vā samabhivyāhāralabhyam, tatra gopanaṃ samādhānabījam | tadubhayaṃ bhavati rụ̄dhervā balavattvaṃ jaladharādiṣviva tathā tātparyonnayanapratibandhena viparītārthatātparyonnayanaparyavasānaṃ vā | yathodāhariṣyamāṇe tathā ca pratīterapratyūhe dūṣaṇatābījābhāvastatra prathamakakṣāpakṣīkaraṇenādyamudāharati | rụ̄dhyupasthāpitaḥ prāthamiko 'rthastasya bhāvo jhaṭiti vākyārthajñānaṃ tasya bhāvanā vāsanā tayā gopanaṃ camatkārārpaṇamatirodhānam | amumevārthamācāryamatena svahastayati—vastumāhātmyeti | avibhāvanāditi | viruddhaṃ vrīḍādāyitayā bhāvanaṃ tasyābhāvāt | tena kvacidyogopādāne 'pi tathābhāvasaṃpattau na doṣaḥ | etadevodāharaṇena sphuṭayati—bhaginīti | etena bhagavatīti pūrvānupāttamudāharaṇaṃ vyākhyātam | dvitīyagopanamaśastārthāntare vyaktībhaviṣyatīti ||
lakṣite yathā—
‘brahmāṇḍakāraṇaṃ yo 'psu nidadhe bījamātmanaḥ |
upasthānaṃ karomyeṣa tasmai śeṣāhiśāyine || 143 ||’
atra brahmāṇḍopasthānaśabdayorasabhyasmṛtihetutve 'pi anyatra lakṣitatvādguṇatvam ||
yasya padasyaikadeśo grāmyānugāmī tasya smṛtihetutā | tatra kutraciduktivaicitryādekadeśo jhaṭiti smārakaḥ, kvacittathaiva samudāyaśakt‍yā viparītārthopasthāpanājjhaṭiti svārthaṃ samudāya eva pratipādayati | ādyo dūṣaṇam | dvitīyastu vaijātyābhāvādguṇaḥ | tadevaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yatrādye grāmyatvaṃ tato 'nyatraiva bahudhā lakṣaṇāttadidamuktam—anyatra lakṣitatvāditi ||
evamaśastādīnāmapi guṇatvam |
yathā—
‘bhadre māri praśastaṃ vada sadasi mudā nṛtya kṛtye muhūrtaṃ‘muhurte’ kha mṛtyo ratnaiścatuṣkaṃ viracaya racayārātrikaṃ kālarātri‘rātre’ kha |
cāmuṇḍe muṇḍamālāmupanaya ‘vinayastrāyatāṃ’ khavinayasvāyatāṃ bhairavīrṣyā- mevaṃ deve bhavānīṃ vadati parijanavyāhṛtistrāyatāṃ vaḥ || 144 ||’
atra mārīkṛtyādīnāmaśastārthānāmapi padānāṃ samastamaṅgalāyatanasya bhagavato viśveśvarasya saṃbandhenoktatvādguṇatvam ||
punarapareṇa prakāreṇa saṃvyānaṃ bhavatītyapraśaste sphorayati | parameśvarasya maṅgalāyatanatvaṃ tatsaṃbandhimātrasyaiva maṅgalībhavananiyamena śāstretihāsādau prasiddhatvāt | taduktam—‘tathāpi smartṝṇāṃ varada paramaṃ maṅgalamasi’ iti | ayaṃ ca prakāro 'praśastārtha eva bhavati | māryādayo mātṛviśeṣāḥ | ārātrikaṃ nīrājanadīpavyāsaṅgapātram | parijanapadaṃ saṃbandhaṃ puṣṇāti ||
dvitīyaṃ gopanaprakāramaśastārthāntaraṃ vyañjayati—
yathā vā—
‘satpakṣā madhuragiraḥ prasādhitāśā madoddhatārambhāḥ |
nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe || 145 ||’
atra dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe nipatantītyasyāmaṅgalārthāntaratve 'pi ‘haṃsānahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāniti vyapadiśāmi’ iti vakṣyamāṇa‘vākyāntaraguptatvāt’ khavākyaguptatvādguṇatvam ||
yathā veti | pakṣaḥ patatraṃ parikaraśca | āśā dik pratyāśā ca | madaḥ kṣībatā darpaśca | nipāta āgamanaṃ śastrādihatānāṃ medinīsaṃgatiśca | raṅgamaṅgalāntaḥ svastyayanapravṛttasya sūtradhārasya maṅgalārthādhikāravastuprastāvanaṃ tāvadbuddhipūrvakamatra na saṃbhavati haṃsānahamityādinā tātparyasya niyamitatvāt | svaśaktyā tu padārthāntaramā-
BREAK2
bhāsayanti padāni doṣatayā na pratibhāsate | tatra vīthyaṅa‍gaviśeṣopakṣepasyāmukhaśarīratvādaucityaniveśa eva sphuṭaṃ kāraṇamityāśayo boddhavyaḥ | aucityavirodho na sārvatrika iti nātiprasaṅa‍ga ||
‘yathā vā’ gayathā ca—
‘ko 'bhipretaḥ susaṃsthānastasyā iti na niścayaḥ |
āśāpiśācikaiṣā tu kumārī māṃ variṣyati || 146 ||’
atrābhipretasusaṃsthānāśāpiśācikā kumārīti padānāmaśastasmṛtihetūnāmapi lokairanyatra lakṣitatvādguṇatvam ||
ko 'bhipreta ityādau pūrvavadeva vāsanā ||
evaṃ ghṛṇāvadarthādīnāmapi guṇatvam |
tatra ghṛṇāvato yathā—
‘padmānyarkāṃśuniṣṭhyūtāḥ pītvā pāvakavipruṣaḥ |
bhūyo vamantīva mukhairudgīrṇāruṇareṇubhiḥ || 147 ||’
atra—
‘niṣṭhyūtodgīrṇavāntādi gauṇavṛttivyapāśrayam |
atisundaramanyattu grāmyakakṣāṃ vigāhate ||’
ghṛṇāvadarthāntarasya yathā—
‘kāminīgaṇḍanisya‘niḥsyandi’ khandabindurindurmato‘rmātarmama’ kha-ga mama |
anyathā kathametasya jagadudda‍yotinī dyutiḥ || 148 ||’
atra rāgātiśayahetubhūtayoḥ kāminīkapolacandramasoḥ svarūpabhāvanāmāhātmyenārthāntarabhāvanā gupteti gaṇḍanisyandabindurityasya ghṛṇāvadarthāntarasyāpi na ‘doṣaḥ’ ka-khadoṣatvam ||
athāparaṃ saṃkhyānaprakāraṃ ghṛṇāvadarthe kathayati—yatheti | guṇavṛttivyāpārāśrayeṣvavāntarādipadeṣu prathamata evānyakriyādidharmāṇāmanyatrārope samādhiprādurbhāvā-
danutthānaṃ doṣābhāvatvadvāraṃ, tataśca mukhya eva sthāne jugupsādāyitvaṃ pūrvācāryaślokenaiva vyācaṣṭe—atretyādi | guṇagrastatvamabhipretyātiśayasaṃpattau prakṛtaucityātkapolasyaiva pratibhāsastadidamuktam—rāgātiśayahetubhūtayoriti | tathā ca jagannayanānandabhūtasya niḥśeṣitāśeṣatamasaścandramaso yadidamabhipretakāminīkapolalāvaṇyabindumātratayā bhānaṃ taducitameveti ||
prācyānāmeva vāsanāmabhisaṃdhāya smṛtihetumudāharati—
ghṛṇāvatsmṛtiheturyathā—
‘vipūyaraśanāvantaḥ palāśāṣāḍhadhāriṇaḥ |
‘brahmavarcasinaḥ’ iti pāṭhaṣṭīkānusārībrahmavarcasvino yānti dvijapogaṇḍakā ime || 149 ||’
atra vipūyapalāśabrahmavarcasapogaṇḍaśabdānāṃ ghṛṇāvatsmṛtihetutve 'pyanyatra‘pyatra’ ka-kha lakṣitatvādadoṣatvam ||
yatheti | āṣạ̄dho daṇḍa; | brahmavarcasina iti | ‘brahmahastibhyāṃ varcasaḥ’ iti samāsāntastato matvarthīya iniḥ | pogaṇḍo bālaḥ ||
evamanyaprakāramapi saṃkhyānādikaṃ svayamunneyamityāha—
evama‘nyatra’ kanyadapi draṣṭavyam | atra ca—
kiṃcidāśrayasaṃbandhāddhatte śobhāmasādhvapi |
kāntāviloca‘lokane’ kananyastaṃ malīmasamivāñjanam || 106 ||
tadyathā—
‘antraprotabṛhatkapālanalakakūrakvaṇatkaṅa‍kaṇa- prāyapreṅkhitabhūribhūṣaṇaravairāghoṣayatyambaram |
pītaccharditaraktakardamaghanaprāgbhāraghorollasa- vdyālolastanabhārabhairavavapurdarpoddhataṃ dhāvati || 150 ||’
atrāśrayasya bībhatsaraso citatvādadoṣatvam‘doṣaḥ’ ka-kha ||
evamiti | anityo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ | tena yatra doṣatā nāsti tatra viṣaye rasaprakāśasāmagryābhantarbhāvātkathaṃ na guṇatvam | antarbhāvaśca dvidhā—prayogaviṣayaucityena vā, vāganubhāvaucityena vā | tatra prathamaṃ darśayati—kiṃciditi | yathāñjanasya nāñjanavallyādisaṃgatatvena śataśo bhāvyamānasyāpyuddīpanavibhāvanā | bhavati tu kāntāvilocanacumbitayānusaṃdhīyamānasya | tathāpadasyāpi viṣaye 'tadviṣaye ca prayujyamānasya | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atrāśrayasyeti |
saṃniveśavaśātkiṃcidviru‘durukta’ gaddhamapi śobhate |
nīlaṃ palāśamābaddhamantarāle srajāmiva || 107 ||
tadyathā—
‘antraiḥ kalpitamaṅa‍galapratisarāḥ strīhastaraktotpala- vyaktottaṃsabhṛtaḥ ‘pinaddhaśirasā’ gapinahya sahasā hṛtpuṇḍarīkasrajaḥ |
etāḥ śoṇitapaṅa‍kakuṅa‍kumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ piba- ntyasthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅa‍ganāḥ || 151 ||’
atra śrṛṅa‍gāriṇo hi jagadapi śrṛṅa‍gāramayaṃ paś‍yantīti bībhatsarase 'pi ‘mārdavena’ kamādhavenāntrādiyadānāmantarāleṣu niveśitānāṃ maṅa‍galapratisarādipadānāmadoṣaḥ ||
dvitīyamantarbhāvaprakāraṃ vyutpādayati—saṃniveśavaśāditi | saṃniveśo vāganubhāvaḥ | aucityākṛṣṭapadaghaṭanā tadvaśatvaṃ tadākṛṣṭatvamata eva virodhisaṃgatatayā vijātīyayorapyaucitīvaśena kāntiviśeṣonmīlakatvāt patrapuṣpavyatikarajamālāsādṛśyaṃ darśayati—nīlamiti | antrairityādau pratyutpannadoṣonmattapretāṅa‍ganāvalokasya mādhavasyālambanoddīpanavibhāvādiprakarpe bībhatsarasotsekastāvadupapannaḥ | yastvayamakasmādeva maṅa‍galādipadānāṃ śṛṅa‍gārānuyāyināmiha niveśaḥ sa kathaṃ doṣabhāvādapanetavyaḥ, kathaṃ vā guṇatvamāsādayitavyamityato hetugarbhaṃ vyācaṣṭe—atra śrṛṅa‍gāriṇa iti | śrṛṅa‍gāravāsanāniviṣṭaḥ śrṛṅa‍gārī | tathā ca pūrvaṃ bībhatsarasānvaye 'pi prakṛta śrṛṅa‍gārabhaṅa‍go mā bhūdityetadarthameva kavinā ‘mama hi’ ityādinā pratijñāya ‘līneva’ ityādivāsanādṛḍhatvamupapāditam | ata eva pratipadaṃ rūpakamāviṣṭābhiprāyamevaṃ śrṛṅa‍gāramayaṃ śrṛṅa‍gārāṅa‍ga-
tayā rasatāpannam | upapadyate ca taccittasya sādṛś‍yamātreṇa tadrūpatānusaṃdhānam | tataśca kathaṃ noddīpanatā vastusattvasyānupayogitvāt | ata eva sūtritasya bībhatsasya prakṛtena bādhāt prakṛtārthānupoṣa iti ||
nanu kathamuddeśe caturviṃśatidhetyuktam | doṣā hi pūrvaṃ ṣoḍaśaiva vibhaktā ityata āha—
aślīlāderamī bhedā bhidyante yattridhā tridhā |
bhavanti nava tenaite pūrvoktā daśa pañca ca || 108 ||
caturviṃśatirityeṣā proktā padasamāśrayā |
samāsātpū‘pūrvadiṣṭānāṃ’ kharvanirdiṣṭadoṣāṇāṃ guṇaklṛptaye‘kalpanā’ ga || 109 ||
ityetatpadadoṣāṇāmadoṣatvamudīritam |
aślīlāderiti | nigadavyākhyātam | caturviṃśatirityeṣeti | ā daśabhyaḥ saṃkhyā saṃkhyeye bartate, tataḥ saṃkhyāne saṃkhyeye cābhidhānāt kevalasaṃkhyānavacanatvena gavāṃ viṃśatiritivatpadasamāśrayetyupapannam |
idānīṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ guṇatvamabhidhīyate || 110 ||
kramaprāptavākyadoṣaguṇībhāvavyutpādanamavatārayati—idānīmiti ||
tatra śabdavihīnasya vivakṣāvaśataḥ kvacit |
nisargasundaratvena guṇatvaṃ parikalpyate || 111 ||
yathā—
‘ākṣipantyaravindāni mugdhe tava mukhacchavim |
kośadaṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāṃ khalu duṣkaram || 152 ||’
atra ‘na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatṛnām’ iti kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhe kimeṣāṃ‘ṣāmasti’ ga duṣkaramityapabhāṣaṇe 'pi saṃbandhamātravivakṣāto guṇatvam |
yadāha—
‘idaṃ hi śāstramāhātmyadarśanālasacetasām |
apabhāṣaṇavadbhāti na ca saubhāgyamujjhati ||’
yasya vastuno nānārūpāṇi vijātīyarūpāṇi tatra tadrupavivakṣāvaicitryācchabdacaicitryaṃ saṃgacchata iti doṣatvābhāvaḥ | evaṃ rūpatā śabdahīnadoṣodāharaṇabhūte ‘nīrandhraṃ gaditavati’ ityādaugamitavatītyādau kadāpi nāstītidoṣarūpataiṣā | kvacitpunarasti rūpāntaramityāha—kvaciditi | bhavatvevam | guṇatvaṃ tu kathamityata āha—nisargeti | niyatarūpavivakṣā hi mahākavīnāṃ na lāvaṇyamanusaṃdhāya bhavitumarhati | tathāhi—ākṣipantītyādau eṣāṃ duṣkaramityatra khalarthayoge ‘na lokāvyayaniṣṭhākhalarthatunām’ ityanena ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhādeṣāmiti kathaṃ ṣaṣṭhīti duṣṭajātīyatāmādāya śeṣarūpaviśeṣavivakṣā samādhānahetuḥ | asti hi ṣaṣṭha‌‍yarthasya saṃbandhasya dvarūpyam—saṃbandhasāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca janyajanakabhāvādiḥ | tatra saṃbandhaviśeṣavihitaṣaṣṭhīmupādāya ‘na loka—‘ ityādinā niṣedhaḥ | saṃbandhasāmānyarūpamupādāya ṣaṣṭhī kena vāryate | ayameva saṃbandhaḥ śeṣa ityucyate | evaṃ tāvanna doṣatvam | yathā koṣasamagrāṇāṃ rājñāṃ vipakṣaśrīharamupadiś‍ya yatkimapi saṃbandhimātrameva na duṣkaraṃ tathā padmānāmiti samarthayāmahe | kathamanyathā durāpatvadvadanaśrīharaṇamiti prakṛtapoṣalābhādguṇatvamatisulabhaṃ tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atreti | nanu saṃbandhamātravivakṣāyāṃ doṣatā mā bhūt, guṇatvaṃ tu kathamiti yathoktamabhisaṃdhāya paramataṃ likhati—idaṃ hīti | śāstramāhātmyaṃ vidhiniṣedhayoḥ parasparāsaṃkīrṇaviṣayatvam ||
yatnaḥ saṃbandhanirjñānahetuḥ ko 'pi kṛto yadi |
kramalaṅa‍ghanamapyāhurna doṣaṃ sūrayo yathā || 112 ||
bandhutyāgastanutyāgo deśatyāga iti triṣu |
ādyantāvāyatakleśau madhyamaḥ kṣaṇikajvaraḥ ||
ādyantau madhyama iti saṃbandhanirjñānahetorvidhānānna śābdakramalaṅa‍ghanaṃdoṣaḥ | vaktuśca bandhutyāgadeśatyāgayostanutyāgādga‍rīyastvenābhimatatvādityarthakramalaṅa‍ghanasyāpi guṇatvam ||
yatna iti | kramabhraṃśe hi yathābhimatānvayapratītipratyūho dūṣakatābījam | tadyadi kutaścidviśeṣādaskhalitaiva pratītirupajāyate tadā bījābhāvena tathābhāvo nivartata eva | sa ca viśeṣaḥ pratipadamanukramituṃ na śakyate iti ko 'pi yatna iti sāmānyena pratipāditam | so 'yaṃ śabdakramalaṅa‍ghanāpavādaḥ | arthakramalaṅa‍ghane tvabhi-
prāyaviśeṣaḥ | tathā hi—bandhutyāga ityādau bandhutyāgatanutyāgadeśatyāgānkameṇoddiś‍ya tathaivānudeśo 'pyarhati na tvādimamuddiś‍ya tato 'ntyastato madhya iti uddeśānudeśalakṣaṇaśāstrakramabhraṃśajātīyatve 'pi saṃbandhajñānahetuyatnakaraṇādadūṣaṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpyate | yatnaścāyameva yadādipadairullekhaḥ | tāni hi tattatsthānaviśeṣagāmina eva pratītimupajanayanti | avaś‍yaṃ cānena krameṇātra vaktumucitaṃ tanutyāgasya vijātīyatāvivakṣayā pṛthageva vaktumarhatvāt | evaṃ cānupapattirloke bandhutyāgāpekṣayā śarīratyāgasyātikṛcchratvena prasiddhiḥ | ataśca ‘madhyama āyatakleśa ādyantau kṣaṇikajvarau’ iti vacanamucitamiti ārthakrabhamabhraṃśaḥ kathaṃ na bhavati tatrāha—vaktuśceti | abhimata‘matatvādi’ iti syātmityanenābhiprāyaviśeṣo 'pavādahetuḥ—‘yathāruci yathārthitvaṃ yathāvyutpatti bhidyate | ābhāso vyartha ekasminnanusaṃdhānasādhitaḥ ||’ ita nyāyādupapannamevaitaditi ||
virūpasaṃdhi yatpūrvaṃ visaṃdhi ca nirūpitam |
na ca durvacake prāyaḥ pragṛhyādau ca duṣyati || 113 ||
tatra durvacake virūpasaṃdhiryathā—
‘jayanti varṣāsviti bhargadurgayoḥ sudurvacā durvacakaprayuktayaḥ |
abheṇnageḍje khamapograbhograrugdhruḍ‌bhramabruṇmukhi sadhryagedhi naḥ || 153 ||’
atrottarārdhasya virūpasaṃdhitve 'pi durvacakatvena kalāvidbhirāddatatvādguṇatvam |
yadāhuḥ—
‘śukastrībālamūrkhāṇāṃ mukhasaṃskārasiddhaye |
prahāsāya ca goṣṭhīṣu vācyā durvacakādayaḥ || 154 ||’
pragṛhyādau vigatasaṃdhiryathā—
‘kamale iva locane ime anubadhnāti vilāsapaddhatiḥ |
sa ito 'bdaṛtāvṛtapriyo na ṛcastvaṃ na yajūṃṣi ūhase || 155 ||’
atra visadheḥ pragṛhyādihetukatvādguṇatvam |
yadāha—
na saṃhitāṃ vivakṣāmītyasaṃdhānaṃ padeṣu yat |
tadvisaṃdhīti nirdiṣṭaṃ na pragṛhyādihetukam || 114 ||
virūpeti | virūpo durvacako visaṃdhirvigataṃ saṃhitākāryaṃ durvacake kalāviśeṣarūpatayānumate saṃhitākāryaniyamaḥ | dvitīye kutrādūṣaṇamityāha—pragṛhyādāviti | pragṛhyaṃ ‘īdūdevddivacanaṃ pragṛhyam’ ityādinā yatra pragṛhyasaṃjñā vihitā, ādigrahaṇādvināpi pragṛhyasaṃjñayā yatra prakṛtibhāvavidhānaṃ tathodāhariṣyate | yatra vā vaktuḥ khedādinā vicchidya pāṭhe viratirbhavati | yathā—kā ekaśiroruheti | tadevaṃ durvacakapragṛhyādi yathāsaṃkhyaṃ virūpavisaṃdhivigatasaṃdhānayorapavādakāraṇe ityāha—atreti | prayujyanta iti prayuktayo durvacakāśca tāḥ prayuktayaśceti durvacakaprayuktaya iti karmadhārayaḥ | sudurvacā iti anyenoccārayitumaśakyāḥ | svayameva kaviḥ pratijñāya uttarārdhe durvacakānyāha—ameḍityādi | he nageḍje parvatarājaputri, khamākāśaṃ bheḍ bhānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmīḍīśvaraścandraḥ so 'vidyamāno yatra | tirodhānādasatkalpanā candramasaḥ | kena punastirodhānamityākāṅa‍kṣāyāṃ dvitīyaṃ viśeṣaṇam—apogreti | apagatogradīptirbha ugrarucirādityastadīyadrohakāriṇo 'bhrapadavācyā meghā yatra | apsu rohatītyabruṭ padmaṃ tadvanmukhaṃ yasyā iti devīsaṃbodhanam | cedīdṛśaṃ tarhi sadhryaṅ sahacaro bhavāsmākamiti gauryā uttaram | kalārūpatvena virūpasaṃdhānasya guṇatvamityāha—kalāvidbhirādṛtatvāditi | kamale ivetyādāvudāharaṇatvānnaikaḥ ślokārdhaḥ | pūrvārdhe kamale ityāditritayaṃ pragṛhyasaṃjñodāharaṇam | uttarārdhe vinaiva pragṛhyasaṃjñāṃ prakṛtibhāvavidhānaṃ yatra tattritayodāharaṇam | tathāhi—abdaṛtāviti | ‘na ṛca’ iti ca ‘ṛtyakaḥ’ ityanena prakṛtibhāvaḥ | yajūṃpi ūhasa iti 'iko 'savarṇe śākalyasya hrasvaśca’ ityanena | aparamādipadagrāhyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtam | atrāpi sa iti voddhavyam | tadetacchāstrānumatamapi ghaṭanāsauṣṭavena niveśanīyam | na tvanyathā | uktaṃ ca pūrvameva yatpragṛhyādihetukamapi nāsakṛtprayoktavyamiti ||
anukampādyatiśayo yadi kaścidvivakṣyate |
na doṣaḥ punarukte 'pi pratyuteyamalaṃkriyā || 115 |
yathā—
‘hanyate sā varārohā smareṇākāṇḍavairiṇā |
hanyate cārusarvāṅa‍gī hanyate mañjubhāṣiṇī || 156 ||’
atra hanyate hanyata iti śabdapunaruktaṃ cārusarvāṅa‍gī varārohetyarthapunaruktaṃ tadubhayamapyanukampādyatiśayavivakṣāyāmadoṣa iti guṇatvam ||
anukampeti | saṃbhramādau yāvadbodhamityādinā padadvirukt‍yāderanumatatvānna doṣatvam | abhiprāyavyañjananaiyatyena prakṛtipoṣānuguṇatayā guṇatvam | tathāhi—hanyata ityādau hanyata iti yadyapyabhidheyatātparyamiti śabdapunaruktajātīyaṃ bhavati, yadyapi ca varārohetyabhidhāya cārusarvāṅa‍gītyabhinnābhidheyatātparyaṃ paryāyarūpatvādarthapunaruktajātīyam, tathāpi virahavedanādūnāyāmanukampātiśayādasakṛdupādānamahirahirbudhyasveti lokānusārāt | anukampābhayādyasya hi tādṛśī padadviruktirabhiprāyaviśeṣārthaniṣpāditayā guṇakakṣādhirohaṇakṣamaivetyāśayavānvyācaṣṭe—tadubhayamapīti ||
padānāṃ vyutkamo yatra krameṇa vyutkameṇa vā |
tavdyākīrṇaṃ vidustasya na doṣaḥ kvāpi tadyathā || 116 ||
‘jugupsata smainamaduṣṭabhāvaṃ maivaṃ bhavānakṣatasādhuvṛttaḥ |
itīva vāco nigṛhītakaṇṭhaiḥ prāṇairarudhyanta maharṣisūnoḥ || 157 ||’
atra ‘mā sma jugupsata’ iti vaktavye ‘jugupsata smainamaduṣṭabhāvaṃ maivam’ iti padavyatikramasya ‘vyaste 'pīcchanti kecit’ iti luṅlaṅorviśeṣalakṣaṇatvādguṇatvam ||
padānāmiti | ekasmin vākye padānāmucitasaṃniveśaviparyāsaḥ kramabhraṃśaḥ | sa dvidhā bhavati—pūrvāparabhāvaniyatānāṃ tādṛśakramapracyāvanena vā | yathā bahutṛṇamityanyo 'rthaḥ, tṛṇaṃ bahvityanyaḥ | pūrvāparaniyamaśūnyānāmiti tādṛguccāraṇaviparyāsena vā | yathā kapālamanulimpati, dukūlaṃ paridadhātītyatra kramaniyamo 'bhimataḥ | anulimpati kapālam, paridadhāti vastramityapi kṛtena tasyaivārthasya lābhāt | yadā tu kapālaṃ paridadhāti dukūlamanulimpatīti kriyate tadā bhavati saṃnidhiviparyāsastadetavdyākīrṇasaṃkīrṇayostulyaṃ, tadidamuktam—krameṇa vyutkrameṇa vā | nanu ‘smotare
laṅ ca’ ityanena māśabdāduttaraṃ yatra smaśabdaprayogastatra luṅlaṅorvidhāne padakramaniyamaḥ kṛtastatkathaṃ sma mameti prayukte so 'rthaḥ pratyetavya ityata āha—vyasta iti | viśeṣeṇa lakṣyata iti viśeṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tasya bhāvastattvam ||
paryāyeṇa dvayoryatra vākyaṃ praśnottarādiṣu |
saṃkīrṇaṃ tanna doṣāya vākovākyavido viduḥ || 117 ||
yathā—
‘bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ khedo 'smāsu na me 'parādhyati bhavānsarve 'parādhā mayi |
tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate nanvetanmama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate || 158 ||’
atra saṃkīrṇatve 'pi vākovākyatvānna doṣaḥ ||
paryāyeṇeti | yatra vākyaikavākyatāyāmavāntaravākyeṣu parasparapadārthapraveśena yathābhimatasaṃsargapratītiḥ skhalitā bhavati tatra saṃkaro dūṣaṇam, pratīteraskhalane tu na doṣaḥ | skhalanaṃ cānekavaktṛkaparyāyapravṛttavākyāvayavamiśraṇena bhavati | tadapi miśraṇaṃ praśnottararūpamanyādṛśaṃ vā bhavatītyāha—praśnottarādiṣviti | viṣayasaptamīyam | vākye vākyaṃ vākovākyaṃ pṛṣodarāditvātsādhu | tatra praśnottarādirūpaṃ vākovākyamudāharati—bāle iti | atra ‘bāle vimuñca māṃ prati ruṣam’ iti prathamapraśnavākyam | ‘nātha roṣānmayā kiṃ kṛtam’ iti tādṛśamevottaravākyam | tatra bāle iti vākyapratīkānantarameva nātheti vākyāntarapratīkasya nirdeśaḥ saṃkīrṇajātīyatāmākārayitumudyataḥ praśnottaraprabhāvādapodyate | saṃkīrṇayorapi vākyayoḥ paryāyanirdeśe bhavatyeva vākovākyamiti cet, na | vyatikarasyābhiprāyaviśeṣavyañjakatayā camatkārakāritvena vijātīyatvāt | ata eva guṇatvam | tathā hi bāle iti padaṃ paracittānabhijñāyāḥ kṣudrasahacarīvacasi viśvāsabhājaḥ sopālambhaṃ saṃbodhanamāviṣkaroti | etadākarṇyānantarameverṣyākaṣāyakāminīvacanamucitamiti nātheti saṃbodhanaṃ sābhiprāyam, prabhurasi na punarasmāsu dattāśayo na vā svādhīnatāsaubhāgyabhāgiti vivakṣitatvāt | evamuttaratra svayamunneyam | upalakṣaṇaṃ ca dvayoriti ekasyāpi vaktuḥ prahelikādau tadvidyaviṣaye tadābhāṣaṇasyocitatvāt | vijātīyavākyadvayasaṃdaṃśapatita-
pade kimidamanenānvīyate 'nena veti saṃdehasaṃkīrṇatāsaṃśayo 'pi saṃkaramadhyāsīna eveti guravaḥ | ayameti putro rājñaḥ puruṣo 'pasāryatāmityatra rājapadaṃ saṃdaṃśapatitaṃ kiṃ pūrveṇātha pareṇānvīyata iti saṃdihyate | rājagokṣīrādau dvayenānvayo gopadasya niścita iti ||
prakṛtisthādibhedena grāmyādibhirathāpi yā |
apadaṃ tasya cānujñā bhāṣācitre vidhīyate || 118 ||
yathā—
‘hā to jo jjaladeu naiva madanaḥ sākṣādayaṃ bhūtale ‘tā kiṃ’ ga; paraṃtu ‘takkim’ iti bhavettatkiṃ dīsaï saccamā hatavapuḥ kāmaḥ kila śrūyate |
‘pacchā ai’ iti ṭīkāsaṃmatamukhyapāṭhaḥai dūe kialeu bhūtapatinā gaurīvivāhotsave aiseṃ sacca ji bollu hastakaṭakaḥ kiṃ darpaṇenekṣyate || 159 ||’
atra grāmyaḥ praṣṭā nagaramāgato rājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā grāmyaiḥ prakṛtisthaireva vā padaiḥ prākṛtena pṛcchati—‘hā to jo jjaladeu’ iti | nāgaraśca tamanujighṛkṣurupanāgaraiḥ komalairvā padaiḥ savakrokti pratyācaṣṭe—‘naiva madanaḥ sākṣādayaṃ bhūtale’ iti | atha grāmya āhitapratibhaḥ pūrvapadānurodhādardhaprākṛtenaiva grāmyopanāgaraiḥ prakṛtisthakomalairvā padaistamupālabhate—‘tatkiṃ dīsaï saccamā hatavapuḥ kāmaḥ kila śrūyate’ iti | atha nāgaro jñātatatprāvīṇyaḥ‘ṇyastatpadā’ ka-kha pādānurodhādeva ardhaprākṛtena grāmyopanāgaranāgaraiḥ prakṛtisthakomalakaṭhorairvā padaiḥ samādhatte—‘ai dūe kialeu bhūtapatinā gaurīvivāhotsave’ iti | atha grāmyaḥ ślokasamāpteḥ pādasya taduttarasya cānurodhādgrāmyāṇi prakṛtisthāni vā tricaturāṇi padāni prākṛte nok‍tvā pādārdha eva tiṣṭhati—‘aiseṃ sacca ji bollu’ iti | atha nāgaro jitakāśī grāmyo-
panāgaranāgaraiḥ prakṛtisthakomalakaṭhorairvā padaiḥ ślokamuttaraṃ ca pūrayati—'hastakaṭakaḥ kiṃ darpaṇenekṣyate’ iti | tatra ca prākṛtānāṃ sarveṣāmapi grāmyatvam | praṣṭuḥ saṃskṛtapadeṣu vapurityupanāgaraṃ śeṣāṇi grāmyāṇi, prativaktuśca hastavivāha gaurīpadāni grāmyāṇi, bhūtapatineti nāgaram, śeṣāṇyupanāgarāṇi | tadidamīdṛśi prameye tathaivopakramādetanna duṣyati ||
prakṛtistheti | ‘vibhinna-’ ityādāvapadalakṣaṇasūtre ṣaṇṇāmiti vyatikara ekatvena nābhipretaḥ | api tu grāmyāditrikasya vā prakṛtisthāditrikasya veti vikalpenopanyāsaprayojanamanujñāsaṃpattistena doṣatābhāvaguṇībhāvau pratipāditau | viṣayaṃ darśayati—bhāṣācitra iti | saṃskṛtādivyatikarasyāpadatvenābhipretatvāt saṃskṛtādayo grāmyādayaḥ prakṛtisthādayaśca bhāṣāśabdenābhimatāḥ | yathā hi—nānāvarṇārabdhamālekhyacitraṃ yathā vā bhinnaprakāratantunirvātaḥ paṭaścitrapaṭastathā nānābhāṣābhirārabdhaṃ kiṃcitkāvyaṃ citramucyate | citramāścaryaṃ tatkāri ca citram | tena rūpadvayasaṃpattau yuktipoṣaḥ syādevaṃ yathaucityākṛṣṭanānābhāṣāvyatikarajamekaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśaṅkya/ saṃkṣepātsarvaṃ bhāṣāsaṃkaramevodāharati—yatheti | saṃkaramācitīṃ ca vyākhyānena sphuṭayati—atra grāmya iti | grāmavāsī kiṃcivdyutpannaśca | grāmyāśca nagaravastunyadbhutacamatkāravanto jijñāsavaśca bhavantīti jātiḥ | tatra rājānaṃ dṛṣṭveti adbhutavastukathanena camatkāraḥ | pṛcchatīti jijñāsā bahumāna ādaraścamatkāreṇaiva | yadvā yānpṛcchati teṣveva bahumāno dhanyāste ye nāmagotrādikametasya jānantaḥ satatamenamavalokyanta ityāśayāt | prastutagrāmyaprakṛteścāsya prākṛtapadaireva praśno yogyaḥ | tadetatsarvamādarśayituṃ praśnaṃ pṛthakkṛtya darśayati—hā to ityādi | ‘hā to’ iti mahārāṣṭrabhāṣāyāṃ praśnakākurayaṃ sa ityarthe | sa iti yo nāmaitannagaranāyakatvenāsmadgrāme 'pi vahuśo vikhyātakīrtiriti camatkāraḥ | jo jjaladeu iti | jijñāsāsāmānyataśca nagarasaṃcariṣṇujanagocaro 'yaṃ praśnaḥ | atra sarvāṇyeva padāni nātihīnapātre grāmye prakṛtibhavānyapabhraṃśapadāni deśīpadatvena sarveṣāṃ grāmyatā | ‘hā to’ ityanena svarakṛtagauravam | ‘jo jjaladeu’ ityekasaṃyogavarṇāpāditagauravaṃ ca prakṛtisthaṃ tadatra prākṛtagrāmyayoraucityākṛṣṭam | prakṛtisthe tu naucityamupayujyate | api tu saṃdarbhārambhastena prakrānta iti vivakṣitam | adhikasya praṣṭavyasyābhāvādetatpraśnānantaramevottarāvasaraḥ | tataśca nānaucityam | praśno-
ttaropanyāso hi prakṛtyaiva ca nāgarakā grāmyamatavirodhino vakroktirasikā bhavanti | yadi tasya grāmye jaghanyabuddhiḥ kimityuttarameṣa dāsyatītyata uktam—anujighṛkṣuriti | sabahumānaṃ pṛcchati | grāmye yasya dayā tadānīmāsīt | jijñāsānivartakrajñānajananamanugrahaḥ | yadyapi nāgarasya nāgarāṇi padāni prayoktu‘marhāṇi’ iti syātmarhanti, tathāpi grāmyānugrahe kartavye tadbodhayogyamevābhimataṃ na tu nāgarakatvam | tarhi grāmyaireva kuto na bravītītyapi na vācyam | sahasaiva tathākaraṇe grāmyamatavirodhaḥ | api tūpanāgarakarūpabhaṅa‍gaprasaṅa‍gāt, tato madhyamānyupanāgarāṇi prayogayogyānītyāha—upanāgarairiti | svabhāvata eva prākṛtaprakṛtisthānāṃ saṃskṛtaprakṛtisthānāṃ prauḍhatvaṃ bhavati | tena yadyapi grāmyaprayuktajātīyānyeva saṃdarbhaikarūpatāsidhdyarthaṃ ghaṭayitumucitāni tathāpyaucitīprāptasaṃskṛtapadaniveśane yadi prakṛtisthatvamādriyeta tataśchāyāvairūpyaṃ syādityāśayena komalaprāyāṇyeva niveśitānītyāha—komalairveti | bhūyasā vyapadeśo bhavatīti lokanyāyānusārāt ‘sākṣāt’ ityekasya prakṛtisthatve 'pi komalairityuktam | sākāṅa‍kṣapraśne ca kimarthaṃ lokottaro ‘jo jjaladeu’ nānyaḥ kaścittādṛgiti bhāvo vivakṣitastatra netyevoktenānugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ syādityadhikamapi kiṃcidvaktumucitamityāha—savakroktīti | etena nāgarakavṛttirupabṛṃhitā | naivetyevakāreṇa manuṣya evāyaṃ na bhavati dūre tadviśeṣarūpo ‘jo jjaladeu’ iti prakāśitam | sākṣāditi pratyakṣeṇāvadhāryamāṇaḥ kiṃcivdyutpannatvena grāmyasyoktatvāt | kāmavyāvṛttasākṣādbhāvalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmānusaṃdhānena madanadāhavyatikaratā saṃbhavatīti labdhāvasaraṃ grāmyānuyogamavatārayati—atheti | śikṣāviśeṣasparśinī buddhiḥ pratibhā | māmekāntato nāgarakavṛttaparicayaparādhīnaṃ mā śaṅkiṣṭhā ityāśayaśauṭīryeṇa nāgarakaprayuktajātīyaireva padaiḥ praśno yogyo na caitāvataiva sarvathā prakṛtityāgo 'rhatītyataḥ svaprayogayogyānyapi prayogamarhanti tatrārdhaṃ prakṛtivaiśasenārdhaṃ prākṛtamardhaṃ grāmyaṃ ca praśnavākyānucitamityāha—pūrvapadānurodhāditi | pūrvaṃ paraprayuktaṃ padaṃ ‘tat kim’ iti syāttarkitam | ‘saccamā’ iti sūlādarśatraye pāṭhaḥsaccimā satyaḥ | yāvatī grāmyasya vyutpattirarhati tāvatīmupanyasyati—śrūyata iti | aitihāsikamukhādevamākarṇitaṃ punaradyāpi nirṇayo vartata ityarthaḥ | tarkitamiti prakṛtistham | dīsaīti komalam | ‘saccamā’ iti sūlādarśatraye pāṭhaḥsaccimeti prakṛtistham | hatavapuriti komalam | kāmaḥ kiletyapi tathā | śrūyata iti prakṛtisthamiti | anantaraṃ nāgarikasyottarā-
vasaraḥ | kathaṃ paramārthavādinyuttaraṃ dātavyamityanupapattāvayaṃ samādhānaprakāro bhavati | asti grāmyasya ‘kila śrūyate’ ityetābhyāṃ saṃdihānatvaṃ kiṃcivdyutpannatvaṃ connītamiti kimapyalīkameva buddhikauśalāttathā pratīyamānamabhidhāya pratāraṇamupapadyate | tanmātraparatvācca sarvākāramadhikāvyutpattirāhatya darśayitumarhatīti tarkitamityādipade yāvatī grāmyasya vyutpattistābadanukaraṇaṃ kiyadadhikavyutpattipuraskāramarhatītyāśayavānuttaramavatārayati—atheti | pādastarkitamityādigrāmyaprayuktastasyānurodho vyutpattyanukaraṇam | pacchā paścāt | ai eṣaḥ | ‘ai dūe’ iti pāṭhe dūaṃ vyājo 'nena vyājena | bhūtapatiḥ paśupatiḥ | nanu na kvacidevaṃ śrūyate tatkathaṃ grāmyasya prabodho bhavatītyāha—gaurīvivāhotsava iti | mā śrūyatāmupapattyā tu siddho dvitīyo yadi kāmaprādurbhāvo na syātkathaṃ gaurīpāṇigrahe bhagavata utsāha ityatastenaiva karuṇāsaṃtānaśāntātmanā bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ syādityarthaḥ | paccheti prakṛtistham, ai iti kaṭhoram, kialeu iti komalam, bhūtapatineti tathā, gaurīvivāhotsava iti prakṛtistham | 'eṁdūeṁ’ iti pāṭhe dvayamapi kaṭhoram | tadatra kaṭhoraniveśanaṃ vyutpattyādhikyasūcanāya | etāvatyukte parīkṣaṇavyutpattirna kiṃcidgrāmyaṃ pratibhāti | na ca tasyādyāpi niḥśaṅa‍katā vartate | tato nāgarakaprāmāṇyadattabharaḥ praśno ghaṭata ityāśayavānavatārayati—atha grāmya iti | prakṛtyāpanna eva, tena yathā prathamaṃ ‘hā to’ ityādipraśne gatistathātrāpīti grāmyaprakṛtisthayorupanyāsaḥ | bhāṣācitreṇa parasparasaṃgharṣādekakāvyaracanāpravṛttayorgrāmyasyāpi ślokaślokasamāptipadārambho yogya eva | yadi cāyameva samastaṃ nirvāhayannaśeṣaśaṅa‍kānivṛttyupayuktamuttaraṃ nāgarasya niveśitaṃ syāditi taduttarānurodhena pādārdha eva vilambo 'pyucitaḥ | ‘aiseṃ’ evamityatrārthe kākugarbham | ‘sacca ji bollu’ iti jiravadhāraṇe | satyamevaitaduktam | yadi satyapuraḥsaraṃ brūyāstadā pratyemītyarthaḥ | evaṃ grāmyatāpratāraṇasiddhau kimatra sarvalokasākṣike vastuni vakroktyaiva pūrvavyutpattimātraniveśanenottaraṃ dattvā ślokapūraṇameva nāgarasyocitamityāśayenottaramavatārayati—atheti | haste iti prakṛtistham, kaṭakamiti komalam, darpaṇenekṣyate ityete prakṛtisthe, iti prakṛtisthādīnāṃ supariceyatvādgrāmyādīnyeva vyācaṣṭe—tatra ceti | prakṛtivyatikarāvyatikaratvayoraucityāpannatvādbhāṣāsaṃkaraḥ śobhāvahatvena guṇa eva bhavatītyuktamupasaṃharati—taditi ||
vākyāntarasagarbhaṃ yadvākyaṃ tadvākyagarbhitam |
rasāntaratiraskāre tadiṣṭaṃ neṣṭamanyathā || 119 ||
yathā—
‘diṅmātaṅa‍gaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sā ca vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmādāvirabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ gatam || 160 ||’
atra ‘yathoktā mahī sādhyate, siddhā sā ca viprāya pratipādyate iti vaktavye, yeyaṃ vīrādbhutarasavaśapravṛttena ‘vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romā ñcitāḥ paśyata’ iti vākyena prakṛtavākyokterasamāptāveva ‘viprāya ityādipadavicchittiḥ sā rasāntaratiraskṛtirityucyate | tayā cedaṃ vākyāntarasagarbhamapi vākyaṃ na doṣāya bhavati ||
vākyāntareti | rasāntaraṃ rasaviśeṣaḥ prakṛtarasānusaṃhito rasastena tiraskāro doṣabhāvasya, tasmin sati tathākṛtaṃ vākyamiṣṭameva kavīnāmupādānayogyameva anyathā neṣṭaṃ duṣṭamevetyarthaḥ | tenāyamartho bhavati—prakṛtarasatirodhāyakatvaṃ kila dūṣaṇatābījaṃ tadatirodhānenaiva nivartate | pratyuta dvitīyaparicchede vakṣyamāṇagarbhādivākyayojanaprakārasaṃpattāvalaṃkāralābhe guṇatvaṃ bhavati | tathā hi—diṅmātaṅa‍gānāṃ ghaṭayā vibhaktāḥ pṛthagudbhidya vyavasthāpitāścatvāra āghāṭā yasyāṃ sā, tathā tena ‘saptadvīpā vasumatī sādhyate’ iti vivakṣitam | ye tāvadbharatabhagīrathaprabhṛtayaḥ prathitapratāpātiśayāsteṣāṃ taddūṣaṇapariniṣṭhitaśaktīnāmekasyāpi samastakṣattravaṃśonmūlanena navakhaṇḍamedinīsiddhau notsāhaśaktiḥ śravaṇagocaratāmayāsīditi lokottarā paraśurāmasyotsāhaśaktirāvedyate | 'siddhā sā ca’ ityanena yāvadabhilaṣitaṃ tāvadeva siddhamityaho vijigīṣuteti pūrvavadevābhiprāyaḥ | na cedasau siddhimabhisaṃdhāya pravṛttaḥ | anupadameva sā saṃpanneti cakāreṇa dyotyate | evamabhihite ‘viprāya‘ 'bhiprāye’ ityādarśe pāṭha āsīt’ ityādikamasti vākyaśeṣabhūtam, tadvicchidyaiva madhye ‘vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ’ iti vākyena sagarbhatā, sā na doṣāya | anena hi vākyena lokottaravastubhāvanātmakavibhāvasaṃpattau prādurbhavan vaktumabhimato raso vyajyate | sa ca vīrānusaṃdhānaheturvīrādbhutayoḥ samānabhūmikayoranyonyānugamanena pratikūlatā virahatā | tatra yathā śṛṅa‍gāraraudrabībhatsānāmeka-
praghaṭṭakena sūtreṇa saṃnipātitairapi hāsyakaruṇabhayānakairna tiraskāraḥ, ‘svāṅa‍gamavyavadhāyakam’ iti nyāyāt, tatheha vīrasyādbhutenāta evādbhutādudvelasya prādurbhūtaputrakāṅa‍kuralakṣaṇānubhāvapradarśanam—‘paśyata’ iti | na cātra doṣodāharaṇe ‘mayā’ iti kārakavibhakterutthitākāṅa‍kṣāyā ‘rakṣainam’ ityādinā svarasaṃbādhastathātra saṃbhavati, 'siddhā’ ityetāvatyapi darśite vākyārthaparyavasānāt | na ca saṃpūrṇe rase ‘vadanta eva’ ityādikamabhidhātumarhati | adbhutatā ca pārthivānubhāvasya tanmātrapūraṇāpekṣatvāt | evaṃ rasānubhāvanātṛptasya tatraiva punaḥ punarutkaṇṭhāyāṃ jigīṣukaraṇīyalavdhapātrapratipattiviśeṣasphoraṇe ‘viprāya pratipādyate’ ityuktam | dānavīro 'pi vīra eva | ata evādhikasya kartavyasyābhāve kimaparamityādirupasaṃhāraḥ | tadetatsarvaṃ vyācaṣṭe—atreti ||
yadbhinnaliṅa‍gamityuktaṃ vibhinnavacanaṃ ca yat |
upamādūṣaṇaṃ tanna yatrodvego na dhīmatām || 120 ||
yathā—
‘anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ śamo lajjeva yoṣitaḥ |
parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyaṃ surateṣviva || 161 ||’
atra ‘puṃso yoṣita iva’ ‘śamo lajjeva’ ‘parākramo vaiyātyamiva’ iti liṅa‍gabhedaḥ | ‘paribhave surateṣviva’ iti tu liṅa‍gabhedo vacanabhedaśca dṛśyate | sa caiṣāmeva parasparamupamānopameyabhāvavivakṣāyāṃ paryāyāntarābhāvādanyathākartuṃ na śakyata iti sahṛdayānudvejakatvānna duṣyatīti doṣasyāpi guṇatvam | tadidaṃ dvayorapyekamudāharaṇam |
atha bhinnaliṅa‍gasyaiva yathā—
‘yasya trivargaśūnyāni dinānyāyānti yānti ca |
sa lohakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jīvati || 162 ||’
atra prāgvadeva paryāyāntarābhāvāt ‘sa lohakārabhastreva’ iti liṅa‍gabhedasya na doṣaḥ ||
yadbhinneti | doṣaprakaraṇānurodhena samastavyastodāharaṇaṃ boddhavyam | sahṛdayodvejakatvena hi doṣatā | yatra tu kathaṃcittathābhāvo na bhavati, tatra doṣatvahānirucitaiva | tathā hi strīpuṃsayoreva prakṛtānuguṇopamānopameyabhāvavivakṣāyāmāvaśyakaṃ liṅa‍gavaṃcanabhedayoranyataradekasya puṃsa upameyatvena dāraśabdasya bhinnavacanatvaniyamātkalatrapadaṃ bhinnavacanameva | paryāyāṇāmapi liṅa‍gabhedo niyataḥ | na ca puṃvacanaṃ kiṃcitsamānasvabhāvamasti yenāyaṃ prakāro nivarteta | na caivaṃvidhopamāmantareṇa prastutavākyārthapoṣaḥ | evamananyagatikā bhinnaliṅa‍gatā bhinnavacanatā vā sāhityasamayavidāmudvegaṃ notpādayati | ata evālaṃkāraucitīsaṃpadā guṇatvasiddhiḥ | evaṃ śamalajjayoḥ parākramavaiyātyayoḥ paribhavasuratayośca boddhavyamityāśayavān vyācaṣṭe—atreti | ‘rataṃ, rahaḥ, śayanaṃ, mohanam’ iti suratavācināṃ sarveṣāmeva napuṃsakatā na duṣyatīti sahṛdayahṛdayānudvejakatvāditi heturguṇatvetvābhiprāyikaḥ | sa ca darśita eva | atheti | dharmārthakāmāstrivargaḥ | vahnividhmāpanacarmapuṭo bhastrā sā yathā vātena pūryate, vātaṃ ca muñcati, na tu kiṃcitpuruṣārthamāsādayati, tathā trivargaśūnye 'pi bhastrāparyāyasya samānaliṅa‍gasyābhāvena sahṛdayānāmanudvegālaṃkārasaṃpattyā guṇatvamupapannamityāha—atra prāgvadeveti | ‘na doṣaḥ’ iti mūlapustakeadoṣa ityupalakṣaṇam, guṇaśca bhavatītyapi boddhavyam ||
bhinnavacanasyaiva yathā—
‘prājyaprabhāvaḥ prabhavo dharmasyāstarajastamāḥ |
muktātmā naḥ śivaṃ nemiranye 'pi dadatāṃ jināḥ || 163 ||
atra ‘nemiranye 'pi’ iti vacanabhedadoṣe 'pi ‘dadatām’ iti kriyāpadādervacanaśleṣamāhātmyādguṇatvam | na cedaṃ vācyamatrevādirna vidyata iti nopamātvam | ivasyāpinā samuccayārthena tulyadharmāṇāṃ tu ‘dharmasya prabhavaḥ’ ityādibhirvacanaśleṣairviṣayāpahārāt | yathā agrato dyotakalopa upamāyām—'komalāpāṭalau tanvi pallavaścādharaśca te |’ nanveṣo 'pi śleṣaḥ kasmānna bhavati | ucyate—‘yatra dvayoḥ sadṛśayorabhidhānaṃ sa śleṣaḥ | yatra sadṛśātsadṛśapratipattistadupamānam, yatra dvayoḥ sādṛśyamabhidhīyate pratīyate vā
sopamā’ iti prabandhenāgrato vakṣyāmaḥ | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat—yadupamāyāmeva liṅa‍gavacanabhedo na dūṣaṇamiti | tasya sarvālaṃkārasādhāraṇatvātkevalaṃ ‘sādṛśyamātra’ gasādṛśyamalaṃkāra iti darśane upamāyāmudāhriyate ||
prājyeti | ārhatānāṃ nemināmā jinaviśeṣo 'nye jinā ṛṣabhanāthaprabhṛtayaḥ prājyamucitaṃ tathābhūtaḥ prabhāvaḥ siddhirūpo yasya tādṛśo nemiḥ śivaṃ dadatāṃ dadātu | 'dada dāne’ iti dhātvanusārāt | kasmai ityapekṣāyāṃ muktātmā ityatra naḥ | pakṣe vo‘no 'smabhyaṃ’ iti syāt; yadvā ‘no 'smabhyam’ pakṣe ‘vo yuṣmabhyam’ ityeva pāṭhe ‘prājyaprabhāḥ’ iti prathamāntamapi pṛthak kalpanīyam yuṣmabhyaṃ śivaṃ dadatāṃ dadatviti | dharmasya ‘prabhava utpatti—’ iti syātprabhavamutpattinimittaṃ nemiḥ | prabhavaḥ prabhutā yathāvadanuśāsanena jināḥ | rajaśca tamaśca rajastamasī te aste kṣipte yena sa tathābhūto nemiḥ | astaṃ rajo yaiste 'starajasasteṣu prakṛṣṭāstamapyarajastamāḥ | mukto nirāvaraṇa ātmā ātmaśabda ātmavacanaḥ svarūpavacana iti vā bahuvrīhistādṛśo nemiḥ | jināstu muktātmāna iti spaṣṭam | tadiha vacanabhedamantareṇa vacanaśleṣābhāvādbhinnavacanatvasyāvaśyakatvena doṣaḥ | śleṣalakṣaṇālaṃkāraghaṭanayā guṇatvam | nanu ca liṅa‍gādibheda upamāyā dūṣaṇatvamuktam, iha tvalaṃkārāntara udāhriyate, tatkathaṃ pūrvāparasamañjasatvam | na cātropamā saṃbhavati, tatsāmagryasaṃbhavāt | upamānopameyasādhāraṇadharmevādiśabdāḥ kila taddhaṭakāḥ | tadatra tritayasaṃbaddhe‘baddhe 'pīva’ iti syāt tvapīvavadvāprabhṛtiṃśabdānupādānātkathamupameti śaṅa‍kāmutthāpya nirasyati—na ceti | ivādayo hi śabdāḥ sādṛśyadyotakāḥ | tathā ca kvacitprasiddhasya prakṛte saṃbandhapratītistebhyo bhavati bimbapratibimbanyāyāśrayaṇāt | evaṃ ca na yugapattulyarūpasaṃbandhaḥ | apiśabdastu yugapattulyarūpasaṃbandhaṃ bodhayatīti vibhinnaviṣayatvam | nahīvādiśabdābhāve sādṛśyameva na pratīyate, luptopamāprapañjabhaṅa‍gaprasaṅa‍gāt | anyata eva pratītisiddherupāyāntaravaiyarthyāt | kimitīha nevādipadaṃ prayuktamiti praśno 'vaśiṣyate tatredamuttaram—ivasyetyādi | nemiranye 'pītyapiśabdena samuccayo 'pyavasīyate | sa ca yugapadekasaṃbandhābhidhāne nirvahati | tenānekamuddiśya kiṃcidekasaṃbandhābhidhānaṃ samuccayābhidhāyino viṣayaḥ | ekamuddiśya prasiddhānyadha‘dharmābhidhānaṃ tu yathevāde’ iti syātrmavidhānaṃ tu yathevādiriti viṣayavirodhānna prayujyata iti | syādetat— ivavadvāyathādiśabdā
yatparāstasyaivopamānatāpratītistathā cānenedaṃ tulyamiti sādhāraṇadharmavidhirūpā kathamupametyata uktam—tulyadharmāṇāṃ tviti | nātra vacanaśleṣatulyadharmāgamaḥ, api tu tathā ‘vyavasthitānāmeva śabdatantratā’ iti ‘dharmasya prabhavaḥ’ ityādibhi‘rbhihiṃ vacanaśleṣa’ iti syātrdvivacanaśleṣaistathāpi viṣayopahṛta iti | yadi cevādimantareṇa nopamāpratītistarhi prasiddhamupamodāharaṇaṃ bhajyetetyāha—yatheti | agrataścaturthaparicchede | atrāpyupamāmanaṅa‍gīkurvato matamāśaṅa‍kate—nanviti | ihāpi cakārābhyāṃ yugapatpallavādharayorekadharmavidhānasya tulyatvāditi deśyābhiprāyaḥ | uktayuktayā dūṣayati—ucyata iti | tarhi prakṛtodāharaṇe nāstyevopamā, kathaṃ vacanabhedasya guṇībhāva udāhriyata ityāha—yatreti | yadyapyabhidhīyamānaṃ nāsti sādṛśyam, tathāpi pratīyamānopamā vyavahriyatāmityarthaḥ | śabdamātrasāmyaṃ śleṣasaṃkīrṇamevetyupekṣitavān | nanu yatropamayā kāvyavyapadeśastatra pratīyamānamapi sādṛśyamūrīkriyate | yatra tvalaṃkārasvabhāvavyavasthāpitameva kāvyaṃ na tatrāpītyāha—upalakṣaṇamiti | pratipattivairūpyasyālaṃkārāntarasādhāraṇyādupamāto 'nyatrāpi liṅa‍gavacanabhedo dūṣaṇameva | tadyathā 'mukhaṃ padmam’ iti rūpake, ‘mukhaṃ padmaṃ vā’ iti saṃśaye, ‘na mukhaṃ padmameva’ ityapahnave | evamanye 'pi | ata eva dve bhinnaliṅa‍gavacane ityatra nopamāgrahaṇam | yadyevaṃ kathamupamāyāmeva dūṣaṇamudāhriyata ityata āha—kevalamiti | ciraṃtanairhi bharatamuniprabhṛtibhirdve eva yamakopame śabdānugatālaṃkāratve neṣṭe | tatprapañcanamātraṃ tu punaranyairalaṃkārakāraiḥ kṛtamupamāyāḥ prabhūtaviṣayatayā prādhānyāccodāhṛtamatisphuṭaṃ bhavatīti saṃkṣepaḥ ||
yatropamānadharmāḥ syurnopameyena saṃmitāḥ |
taddhīnopamamityāhustatprasiddhau na duṣyati || 121 ||
yathā—
‘sa mārutākampiṃtapītavāsā biṃbhratsalīlaṃ śaśibhāsamabjam |
yadupravīraḥ pragṛhītaśārṅa‍gaḥ sendrāyudho megha ivābabhāse || 164 ||’
atra sendrāyudha iti ‘kārmukamātropādānaṃ’ ka; ‘kārmukasyopādā’ gakārmukamātrasyopādānaṃ vāsaḥśaṅa‍khyostvanupādānādūnopamatvam | tatrenduvidyutoratiprasiddhatvādadoṣatvam ||
yadāha—
‘sarvaṃ sarveṇa sārūpyaṃ nāsti bhāvasya kasyacit |
yathopapatti kṛtibhirupamānaṃ prayujyate ||
akhaṇḍamaṇḍalaḥ kvenduḥ kva kāntānanamadyuti |
yatkiṃcitkāntisāmyāttu śaśinaivopamīyate ||’
yatropamāneti | upameyenopameyaviśeṣaṇena saṃmitāstulyasaṃkhyāḥ | indrāyudhamindradhanurekamupamāne upameye pītaṃ vāsaḥ śārṅa‍gamabjaḥ śaṅa‍kha iti trīṇi viśeṣaṇāni tadihādhikaviśeṣaṇaviṣaya iti jijñāsāsamakālamevāprasiddhendubimbayorupamānayormeghānusaṃdhānāt skhalanābhimukhī pratītiravalakṣyate | dhvananavyāpāronmeṣācca guṇatvalābhaḥ | taduktam—‘mukhyā mahākavigirāmalaṃkṛtibhṛtāmapi | pratīyamānacchāyaiṣā bhūṣā lajjeva yoṣitām ||’ iti | na caivaṃ stanitādīnāmiti kathaṃ pratītiriti vācyam | pratīyamānasyāpi pratipattivairūpyasamādhāvānaupayikasthānākāṅa‍kṣitatvenādarādityāha—sarvaṃ sarveṇeti | yathopapattiparyanto yāvatopamānaviśeṣaṇatvena prakṛtamupameyaviśeṣaṇapratibimbatā nīyate tadatikrameṇaikapratītyanurodhe kalpitenāpyupameyaviśeṣaṇenetyarthaḥ | anyathā candramukhādīnāṃ nopamā paryavasyetetyāha—akhaṇḍeti ||
amumeva prakāramadhikopameye yojayannāha—
krameṇānena kṛtibhireṣṭavyamadhikopamam |
viśeṣastūpameyāṅa‍gamanumānātpratīyate ||122 ||
yathā—
‘sa pītavāsāḥ pragṛhītaśārṅgo manojñabhīmaṃ vapurāpa kṛṣṇaḥ |
śatahradendrāyudhavānniśāyāṃ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ śaśineva meghaḥ || 165 ||’
atra śaśino grahaṇādadhikopamatve 'pyupamānatvenāvivakṣitatvādguṇatvam | yadi vopamāne dharmoddhāṭanānumānāt ‘śaṅa‍khacakragadādharo viṣṇuḥ’ iti prasiddheḥ śārṅa‍gamanumeyam ||
krameṇeti | yatropamāne 'dhikaviśeṣaṇasaṃkṣepastadvākyamadhikopamamityucyate tatra jhaṭiti pratibimbabhūtopameyaviśeṣaṇapratisaṃdhānena doṣaḥ | tadeva tu kathamata uktam—
viśeṣastviti | upameyāṃśe viśeṣa‘viśeṣāditi’ ityādarśapāṭhaḥviśeṣaṇamupādānā(?)dupamānaviśeṣaṇātpratīyate | śatahradā vidyut | upamānatvenāvivakṣitatvādityāpātataḥ | upamānaviśeṣaṇānāṃ yāvatpratīti na grahaṇamiti prakāśayituṃ pāramārthikastvayaṃ siddhānta ityāha—yadi veti | upamānadharmasyādhikasyoddhāṭanamabhidhānaṃ tasyānu paścānmānaṃ jñānam | kathametadityāha—itiiti mūle pāṭhaḥ prasiddheriti ||
yadā tīvraprayatnena saṃyogāderagauravam |
na cchandobhaṅa‍ga‘bhaṅa‍gamapyāhuḥ’ ka ityāhustadā doṣāya sūrayaḥ || 123 ||
yathā—
‘jaha ṇhāuṃ oiṇṇe abbhantamulhāsiamaṃsuaddhantam |
taha a ṇhāā si tumaṃ sacche golāṇaītūhe || 166 ||’
[yathā snātumavatīrṇe ārdrībhūtamullāsitamuṃśukārdhāntam |
tathā ca snātā bhavasi tvaṃ svacche godānadītīrthe ||]
atra dvitīyaikādaśatrayoviṃśativarṇānāṃ saṃyogaparatvādgurutve 'pi ṇhālhādisaṃyogasya tīvraprayatnoccāraṇena ‘punarlaghu’ gapūrvalaghutve na chandobhaṅa‍ga iti guṇatvam ||
yadeti | prayatanaṃ prayatnaḥ sthānakaraṇavyāpārastasya tīvratvamudrekastata eva hi piṇḍākṣarādīnāmakaṭhoratvamābhāsate | ādigrahaṇādivahikārau‘ihikārā vindujuā’ iti prākṛtapiṅa‍galoktyā ‘ikārahikārau’ iti; ‘ihikārau’ iti vā pāṭhaḥ sānusvārau ca kevalau padānte vartamānau tattadbhāṣāviṣaye 'vaseyau | kvacideva hi varṇe tathāvabhāsate na tu sarvatra | tadupalakṣaṇameva ‘raha vaṃjaṇasaṃjoe’ [ ‘rahau vyañjanasaṃyoge’ ] ityādikaṃ chandovicitau darśitam | jaheti | snātumavatīrṇe tvayi aṃśukārdhamudbhraṣṭaṃ sadabbhantamārdrobhūtaṃ yathā calatvaṃ‘labdham’ syāt sthitestathāvagamyate na tvantarjalaṃ jalakelisthānamavatīrṇa ityabhiprāyaśeṣaḥ | kathamanyathā godāvarīnadyāḥ svacchaṃ jalaṃ dṛśyate iti | tūhaṃ tīrtham | atra dvitīyaikādaśādisthāneṣu yadyapi saṃyogātpūrvabhāve gurutvaṃ vidyate-
rtathāpi tīvraprayatnoccāraṇīyaśakārahakārādisaṃyogamahimnā nāvacchedaśravyatā kaluṣīkriyata iti | evamanyadapyudāhāryam | yathā—
‘dhabalāiṃ galetti dhavalehiṃ aṇañjaṇasāmalehi ṇisālaāe |
ṇakhavattakusumāiṃ ṇahaalāo osaraï ||’
ityādi nāmadhātubhāge svarāsaṃdhāne ca paṭhitivicchedo na bhavatītyuktaṃ sa ‘mullaṅa‍ghya’ syāttadul‍laṃṅa‍ghanamātreṇa samādhīyate śobhāṃ puṣyatīti ||
vākyamasthānavirati prāgbhagnayatisaṃjñayā |
samuddiṣṭaṃ yadadhunā guṇatvaṃ tasya kalpyate || 124 ||
yathā—
‘śobhāṃ puṣyatyayamabhinavaḥ sundarīṇāṃ prabodhaḥ kiṃcidbhāvālasamasaralaprekṣitaṃ kāminīnām |
kāryākāryāṇyayamavika‘vikalenāgamenaiva’ kalānyāgamenaiva paśya- nvaśyāmurvīṃ vahati nṛpa ityasti cāyaṃ prayogaḥ || 167 ||’
atra pādatraye caturthasthāne yatau kartavyāyāṃ pañcamasthāne kṛtatvādaparatra ca pādasya madhyabhāge niviṣṭakevalasvaratvād yatibhraṃśe 'pi svarasaṃdhikṛtatvādavibhinnanāmadhātuśarīratvācca na doṣatvam ||
yadāha—
‘svarasaṃdhyakṛte prāyo dhātubhede tadiṣyate |
nāmabhede ca śeṣeṣu na doṣa iti sūrayaḥ ||
lupte padānte śeṣasya padatvaṃ niścitaṃ yathā |
tathā saṃdhivikārāntaṃ padameveti varṇyate ||’
vākyamiti |.........................................|
śobhāmiti |..........................................|
kāryākāryeti ca nāmabhāgamul‍laṅa‍ghya vicchedaśravyatā ca parasya yaṇādeśena ‘kiṃcidbhāvā’ iti ‘nṛpa’ iti ca svarasaṃdhāne vicchedo 'ta eva śravyatvamapi | tadetavdyācaṣṭe—atreti | ‘mandākrāntā mabhanatayugaṃ gadvayaṃ vedadigbhiḥ’ iti caturthadaśamayoryatirāmnātā | pañcamasthāna iti | prathamatṛtīyayordvitīye tu ṣaṣṭhe yatikaraṇāditi boddhavyam | nanu padacchede svarasaṃdhānapaṭhitivirāmaḥ sollekho lakṣyate, na tu catuṣpāde tathāstīti kathaṃ śravyatvamata āha—lupta iti | saṃdhau vikāro yatvayalopādikaṃ kāryaṃ, tathā ca padānte sati padaccheda evāyamikāro 'vatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ ||
aśarīraṃ kriyāhīnaṃ kriyāpekṣā na yatra tu |
‘prāśastyāde’ kayatrāstyāderapekṣā vā na doṣastatra tadyathā || 125 ||
yathā—
‘kiyanmātraṃ jalaṃ vipra jānudaghnaṃ narādhipa |
tathāpīyamavasthā te nahi sarve bhavādṛśāḥ || 168 ||’
atra triṣu pādeṣu padāni kriyā viśeṣakriyā | kriyāsāmānyavācakapadaṃ tu ‘tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe prathamā’ ityukta‍yanusāreṇa prathamāsidhdyarthamapekṣitameva | ataeva ‘sāpekṣam’ ityādyagrimagranthasaṃgatiḥkriyāpadaṃ nāpekṣante | sāpekṣaṃ cāsamarthaṃ bhavati | caturthe tu nahītyādibhiḥ santītyapekṣate‘prekṣyate’ iti syāt na caitāvatāmīṣāmasāmarthyaṃ bhavati | yadāha—‘yatrānyat kriyāpadaṃ nāsti, ‘astirbhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ’ katatrāsti bhavatīti padaṃ prathamapuruṣe prayujyate’ iti ||
aśarīramiti | pradhānāvimarśe hi dūṣaṇamityuktaṃ tadupāttānāmeva padārthānāṃ pradhānagarbhīkaraṇe tatpratibandhe 'vaśyavidheyamanyaṃ prati guṇībhāve vā samādhīyate | ata eva viśeṣādguṇatvam | tathā hi—‘kiyanmātraṃ’ ‘jānudaghnam’ ityanayoḥ ‘parimitikriyā’ syātparimitam | kriyā pradhānagarbhabhūtā | ‘nahi sarve bhavādṛśāḥ’ ityatra tu sattākriyāyāḥ sakalapadārthāvyabhicārāt ‘apekṣyate’ iti siddhiḥ | tadidamācāryamatenāha—yatrānyaditi | bhavantī vartamānā | tadetadvākyaṃ kriyāpradhānamiti ‘darśane’ iti syātdadarśa ‘sa‘sā’ iti syāt pradhānaṃ
viśeṣyamātraṃ tu vākyārthe’ iti paramārthaḥ | tena ‘rādhā rahaḥ sākṣiṇām’ ityādāvāvaśyakavidheyasākṣibhāvādiguṇatayā rādhāsaṃbandhādīnāṃ vaivakṣikaprādhānyānāmapi pradhānatvāvimarśo na doṣa ityuktaṃ bhavati ||
śliṣṭamaspṛṣṭaśaithilyaṃ śithilaṃ tadviparyayaḥ |
gauḍīyairiṣyate tattu bandhaprāśastyagauravāt || 126 ||
yathā—
‘līlāvilolalalanā lalitālakalālasāḥ‘lāsakāḥ’ ka |
viluptamālatīmālā jalakālānilā vavuḥ || 169 ||’
atra śaithilyadoṣe 'pi bandhaprāśastyena gauḍairādṛtatvādguṇatvam ||
śliṣṭamiti | pāruṣyaśaithilyābhyāṃ vinā kṛtaṃ śliṣṭamityuktaṃ tasya viparyayo viparītaṃ vākyaṃ śithilaṃ bhavati | paruṣamalpaprāṇākṣarottaraṃ vetyarthaḥ | evaṃvidhamapi caitadanuprāsasauṣṭhavātpadānāmekatāpratibhāse samādhīyata udbhaṭānuprāsatayā ca kāntiprādhānye gauḍīyarītiprādhānyena guṇatvamāsādayati tadidamuktam—bandhaprāśastyagauravāditi | gauḍīyairgauḍīyarītigocarahetuvākprakarṣaśālibhiḥ || līleti | atra dantyavarṇamayatvenālpaprāṇākṣarottaratāyāmapi padaikatāpratibhāsānuprāsayorudrekaḥ kāntiprakarṣo 'vaseyaḥ ||
na doṣaḥ kvāpi vaiṣamye 'pyarthālaṃkārakāraṇāt |
paurastyairādṛtatvācca śabdāḍambarato 'pi vā || 127 ||
yathā—
‘candanapraṇayodgandhirmando malayamārutaḥ |
spardhate ruddhamaddhairyo vararāmā‘mukhā’ kananānilaiḥ || 170 ||’
atra satyapi ‘śabdavaiṣamyadoṣe’ gavaiṣamyadoṣe śabdālaṃkāraguṇādarthālaṃkāraguṇātpaurastyairādṛtatvācca guṇatvam ||
na doṣa iti | arthālaṃkārakāraṇādarthālaṃkārarūpam | yatra hiśabdasyārtho 'nyathānyathārūpaṃ bhajate tatrāvaśyaṃ tadanuyāyinā padasaṃdarbheṇa bhinnarūpeṇa bhāvyam | evamapi chāyāvairūpyaṃ vairasyamevāvahatītyāśaṅa‍kya ‘śabdāḍambara’ ityuktam | āḍambara
udbhaṭatā | ‘tasyāpyekarītyanirvāho dūṣaṇamityatra ‘paurastyaiḥ’ ityuktam | śarāvatyāḥ prāgdeśabhavāḥ paurastyāstadīyahevākaprācuryabhāja eva hi khaṇḍarītayaḥ | candaneti | atra yadyapi malayānila eka eva vākyārthastathāpi candanapraṇayena pravṛddhasaurabhe manda ityābhyāṃ śṛṅgārāṅa‍gatāpratītāvunmiśraḥ saṃdarbhaḥ | malayamāruta iti komalaḥ, vararāmāmukhānilairityapi tathā, tatrāpyārabhaṭīprakāśane spardhata iti sphuṭam | evaṃ rūddhamaddhairya iti | tadevaṃ samatāviparyāse 'pi viśeṣaṇānāmarthānāṃ bhinnabhinnarasānupraveśe pṛthagarthālaṃkāraḥ prakāśante | asti cātra śabdāḍambaravaśādeva chāyārūpāpratibhāsaḥ | lāṭīyā ca rītiḥ ||
kaṭhoramapi badhnanti ‘pradīptamapare’ gadīptamityapare punaḥ |
teṣāṃ matena tasyāpi dūṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate || 128 ||
yathā—
‘nyakṣeṇa pakṣaḥ kṣapitaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇādayam |
atra kaṭhoratve 'pi dīptatvādguṇatvam ||’
kaṭhoramiti | sukumāratāviparyāsaḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṃdarbhaḥ prasphuṭataravarṇāpradhānamiti yāvat | so 'yaṃ dīptarasānupraveśādaucityena guṇatvaṃ bhajata iti vyaktam | apare paurastyāḥ | nyakṣeṇa sāmastyena ||
avidvadaṅaga‍nābālaprasiddhārthaṃ prasādavat |
viparyayo 'syāprasannaṃ citrādau tanna duṣyati || 129 ||
yathā—
‘yāśritā pāvanatayā yātanācchidanīcayā |
yācanīyā dhiyā māyāyāmāyāsaṃ stutā śriyā || 171 ||’
atrāprasādadoṣe 'pi citratvādguṇatvam ||
avidvaditi | viparyayaḥ pratyanīkabhūtaṃ vākyam | ādigrahaṇādyamakaśleṣaprahelikāprakaraṇāni | yā devī pavitratvenāśritā | anīcayā tuṅa‍gyā budhdyā māyāyāmasya avidyāvistārasyāyāsaṃ glāniṃ vicchedaṃ yācanīyā prārthanīyā | yato yātanaṃ narakā-
nubhavanīyaṃ duḥkhaṃ chinatti | śriyāpi stuteti | aṣṭadalakamalabandho 'yam | tadiha tathā varā(?)saṃniveśasya camatkārakāritvena prasādo 'pi sahṛdayaślāghāviṣayo guṇatāmadhyāsta iti ||
adhyāhārādigamyārthaṃ neyārthaṃ prāgudāhṛtam |
sa gamyate prasiddhaścenna taddoṣavadiṣyate || 130 ||
yathā—
‘māṃ bhavantamanalaḥ pavano vā vāraṇo madakalaḥ paraśurvā |
vāhinījalabharaḥ kuliśaṃ vā svasti te 'stu latayā saha vṛkṣa || 172 ||’
atra dahatvityādīnāmadhyāhāryatayā neyatve 'pyatiprasidhdyā pratīyamānatvādguṇatvam ||
adhyāhāreti | asaṃpūrṇaṃ vākyaṃ neyārthamityuktaṃ tasyaivaṃrūpatā jhaṭiti śrutārthāpattiprādurbhāvaparihnavakasaṃdhānātsamādhīyate | tathā hi—‘mā bhavantamanalaḥ’ ityādau vṛkṣasamabhivyāhāreṇa dahanādīnāṃ yogyatayā śīghrameva dhākṣīdityādikriyānvayo 'vasīyate | svastivacanena cāmaṅa‍galaprastāvanirāsāttathābhūtakriyānupādānaṃ vakrakṣamatayā guṇa iti ||
asabhyāryaṃ mataṃ grāmyaṃ tadgrāmyottkyaiva duṣyati |
vidagdhoktau tu tasyāhurguṇavattvaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ || 131 ||
yathā—
‘kāmaṃ kandarpacāṇḍālo mayi vāmākṣi nirdayaḥ |
tvayi ‘nirbhartsano’ ganirmatsaro diṣṭyā so 'yamasmāsvanugrahaḥ || 173 ||’
atra grāmyatve 'pi grāmyārthasya vidagdhoktyā tiraskṛtatvādguṇatvam ||
asabhyārthamiti | rasasyādīptiḥ kāntiviparyayo ‘vacanāparārdhena’ iti pāṭhaḥvacanāparādhena dūṣaṇatāmadhyāste, sa samādhīyate 'tra grāmyoktiparihāreṇaiva | ata evoktisamarpitacchāyāviśeṣayoge guṇatvalābhaḥ | sahṛdayasabhāyāṃ na sādhurasabhyaḥ | vaidagdhyavidhuraṃ grāmyam ||
ojaḥ samāsabhūyastvaṃ taddīptārtheṣu vadhyate |
viparyayo 'syāḥ samastaṃ taddīptaṃ cenna doṣabhāk || 132 ||
yathā—
‘yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumadaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśuradhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā |
yo yastatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaśca yaśca pratīpaḥ krodhāndhastasya tasya svayamiha jagatāmantakasyāntako 'ham || 174 ||’
atrāsamastatve 'pi ‘vyūḍha’ iti ṭīkāsaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥprauḍhabandhatvādguṇatvam ||
oja iti | dīptarasānupraviṣṭārthapratipādakasaṃdarbhaucityena samāsabhūyastvamojaḥ | asya viparyayo dīpterapratyūhādeva samādhīyate | tadidamuktam—‘dīptārthaṃ badhyate yatra taddīptaṃ cenna duṣyati’ iti | sugamamudāharaṇam | vyūḍhaḥprauḍhaḥ ||
samastamasamastaṃ vā na nirvahati yadvacaḥ |
tadanirvyūḍhamasyāpi na doṣaḥ kvāpi tadyathā || 133 ||
yathā—
‘prasīda caṇḍi tyaja manyumañjasā janastavāyaṃ purataḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ |
kimarthamutkampitapīvarastana- dvayaṃ tvayā luptavilāsamāsyate || 175 ||’
‘atra samastarītyā’ ka-khaatrāsamastarītyanirvāhādanirvyūḍhatve 'pi rasāntaraparigraheṇa rītyantaraparigrahādguṇatvam ||
samastamiti | upakrāntarīteranirvāhe ‘madhurasaparyantā’ iti syātmadhurarasaparyantā pratītiḥ skhalatīti dūṣaṇatābījamuktam | tathābhūtarasānuguṇavyabhicāryanupraveśavyañjanaucityādupakramanirvāhaḥ sarvasvāyamāno guṇatāmāsādayati | tathā hi—prasīdetyādau praṇayakelikupitakāminīprasādanāyāṃ śṛṅa‍gāravirodhisamāsavyatikareṇa rīterapyapakrame roṣalakṣaṇabhāvānubhāvabhūḥ‘bhūtastana’ syāt stanakampavarṇanāyāṃ samāso 'nupraviṣṭa iti vyaktaḥ pūrvarīteranirvāhaḥ | rasāntaraṃ prakṛtavijātīyarasasaṃbaddho vyabhicārī bhāvaḥ ||
‘niralaṃkāra’ gaanalaṃkāramityāhuralaṃkārojjhitaṃ vacaḥ |
pūrvottarānusaṃdhāne tasya sādhutvamiṣyate || 134 ||
yathā—
‘niśamya tāḥ śeṣagavīrabhidhātumadhokṣajaḥ |
śiṣyāya bṛhatāṃ patyuḥ prastāvamadiśaddṛśā || 176 ||’
asyānalaṃkāratve 'pi pūrvāparānusaṃdhānaprayojanabhūtatvādguṇatvam ||
analaṃkāramiti | anutkṛṣṭāpraviṣṭaviśeṣaṇavadvākyaṃ niralaṃkāraḥ pūrvottaravākyasaṃgatikaraṇaprayojanakatayā na doṣaḥ | kathaṃ tathābhūtasya kāvyatvamityapi na vācyam | anugatena vakrībhāvena tatsamarthanāt | vyaktamudāharaṇam ||
sūtrakāra eva vākyārthadoṣaguṇībhāvavivecanaṃ saṃgamayati—
vākyāśrayāṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ guṇībhāvo 'yamīritaḥ |
atha vākyārthadoṣāṇāmadoṣaḥ kathyate 'dhunā || 135 ||
samudāyārthaśūnyaṃ yattadapārthaṃ pracakṣate |
tanmattonmattabālānāmukteranyatra duṣyati || 136 ||
yathā—
‘kvākāryaṃ‘kṛtyaṃ’ ga śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāmupaśāntaye śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham |
kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyo‘dhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā’ ga rekhaiva sānyādṛśī cetaḥ svāsthyamupehi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati || 177 ||
atra samudāyārthaśūnyatvenāpārthasyāpyunmattavacanatvādguṇatvam ||
vākyāśrayāṇāmiti | ‘mattādivavanānya’ pāṭhaḥsattādivacanānyanukriyamāṇāni camatkāramarpayanti | ata eva chāyālaṃkāraprādurbhāvādguṇaḥ | anityadoṣatayā cānukaraṇādanyadapi guṇībhavanabījamunneyamityudāharaṇena vyañjayannāha—kvākṛtyamiti | atra śrutiśālino
nāyakasya vāsanāparipākavaśādvipralambhāveśe 'pi prathamaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ—‘kvākṛtyaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva nu kulam’ iti | tadevaṃ śāntarasānuyāyinamanantarameva bādhitvā cittānurañjakaprakṛtarasāvyabhicāriṇā autsukyasya prādurbhāvaḥ—‘bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā’ iti | evaṃ ‘doṣāṇāmupaśāntaye śrutam’ ityādyaucityādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvaprādurbhūtānāmuttarottarabhāvibhiścintāprabhṛtibhirapavāde prakṛtavāsanā praụdhiravaseyā | unmattavacanatvāditi | rasāviṣṭacetasastadutkalikāprāyāṇāṃ bhāvānāmavyavasthayā kīrtanamunmādaḥ ||
‘prayojakaṃ’ gayadaprayojanaṃ yacca gatārthaṃ vyarthameva yat |
tasyāpi kvāpi nirdoṣaḥ prayogo dṛśyate yathā || 137 ||
yathā—
‘gītā viduravākyāni dharmāḥ śāntanaveritāḥ |
na śrutā bhārate yena tasya janma nirarthakam || 178 ||’
atra gītāviduravākyādīnāṃ kathāyāmaprayojakatve 'pītihāsavyājena caturvargapratipādanasyārambha eva pratijñānādguṇatvam | tadidamaprayojanam ||
yadprayojanamiti | prabandhārthapoṣā‘poṣo nādhāyaka’ pāṭhaḥnādhāyakavākyamaprayojanam | arthaṃlābhapratipādakatayā kṛtakaraṃ vyartham | evakāro bhinnakramastacchabdānantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ | dṛśyata ityanena tatra tatra prakṛtasaṃgatau satyāṃ doṣābhāvo 'vaseya iti darśitam | yadyapi bhagavadgītāyāṃ mokṣādhikāriṇāmastyeva prakṛtaśāntarasaparipoṣakatvam, tathāpi tadantargatānāṃ bhūyasāmāhatya nāsti | bhīṣmaviduravākyānāṃ tu dharmādhikāre prakṛtānāṃ vyakta eva niṣprayojanaprastāvaḥ‘stāvaḥ’ pāṭhaḥ | so 'yaṃ yathā samādhīyate tadvivṛṇoti—atreti | itihāsarūpe prabandhe satyapi śāntasya vākyārthābhāvena bahūnāmitihāsānāṃ trivargādhikāritvāccaturvargapratipādanameva maharṣerabhimatam, dharmāditritayasya ca prāsaṅgikatayā na pūrvavadasyārthaikatāvirodhaḥ | tadidamuktam—vyājeneti | evaṃ ca vyutpādayitavyaviṣayajijñāsopādāne dharmārthapravṛttaye vākyamidaṃ saphalatāmāsādayadguṇa eva bhavati ||
evaṃ gatārthamapi yathā—
‘hṛtkaṇṭhavaktraśrotreṣu kasya nāvasthitaṃ tava |
śrīkhaṇḍahārakarpūradantapatraprabhaṃ yaśaḥ || 179 ||’
atraikenaivopamānena ‘śubhratva’ gaśauklyapratītau śeṣopamānapādānāṃ vyarthatve 'pi yaśasaḥ smaryamāṇatvagīyamānatvastūyamānatvaśrūyamāṇatvairhṛdayādiṣu śrīkhaṇḍādivadanasthānasya pratīyamānatvādguṇatvam ||
evaṃ gatārthamapīti | śrīkhaṇḍenaivopamāne yaśasaḥ śuddhatvamavagataṃ śleṣopamānapadāni kevalakṛtakarāṇīti vyarthatvaprasaṅa‍ge smaraṇādiviśeṣavivakṣayā tiraskriyate, yathāsaṃkhyādibhaṅgisaubhāgyena ca guṇībhāva iti ||
aviśeṣeṇa pūrvoktaṃ yadi bhūyo 'pi kīrtyate |
tadekārthaṃ rasākṣiptacetasāṃ tanna duṣyati || 138 ||
yathā—
‘asāraṃ saṃsāraṃ parimuṣitaratnaṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokaṃ maraṇaśaraṇaṃ bāndhavajanam |
adarpaṃ kandarpaṃ jananayananirmāṇamaphalaṃ jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ kathamasi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ || 180 ||’
'asāraṃ saṃsāram’ ityuktvā ‘paribhuṣitaratnaṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokam’ ‘jagajjīrṇāraṇyam’ iti yaduktam, tasya viśeṣānabhidhāyakatve 'pi rasākṣiptena vaktrābhihitatvādguṇatvam ||
aviśeṣeṇeti | pūrvoktapūrvoktābhinnatātparyakamaviśeṣeṇa tātparyāvṛttiprayojanamantareṇa tanmayībhavanaṃ cetasa ākṣepaḥ | ‘asāraṃ saṃsāram’ ityanena sthāvarajaṅa‍gamaprapañcasya niḥsāratāṃ pratipādya ‘jātau jātau yadutkṛṣṭaṃ taddhi ratnaṃ pracakṣate’ iti | 'paribhuṣitaratnam’ ityatrāpi tāvāneva tātparyārthaḥ | evaṃ ‘nirālokaṃ lokaṃ', ‘jagajjīrṇāraṇyam’ ityatrāpi draṣṭavyam | sugamamanyat ||
saṃśayāyaiva saṃdigdhaṃ yadi jātu prayujyate |
syādalaṃkāra evāsau na doṣastatra tadyathā || 139 ||
‘kutto lambhaï panthia sattharaaṃ ettha gāmaṇigharammi |
uṇṇaapaohare pekkhiūṇa jaï vasasi tā vasasu || 181 ||’
[kuto labhyate pathika srastarakamatra grāmaṇīgṛhe |
unnatapayodharānprekṣya yadi vasasi tadā vasa ||]
atra kenāpi pathikayūnā prāvṛḍārambhe grāmaṇīvadhūḥ pīnonnatastanī sattharaamiti srastarakavyājena śastarataṃ yācitā | taṃ pratyācakṣāṇeva yathoktaṃ brūte—‘kuto 'tra grāmaṇīgṛhe srastarakaḥ, kuto vā śastaṃ ratam | unnatau payodharau mama hṛdaye nabhasi vā payodharāndṛṣṭvā yadi vasasi tadā vasa’ iti tadetasya gopanāya ‘nānārthaireva’ gavdyarthaireva padaiḥ prayuktamiti saṃdigdhasyāpyasya guṇatvam ||
saṃśayāyaiveti | miśro viruddhārthavākyaṃ saṃśayāpādanena duṣyatītyuktam | yadā tu saṃdeha eva tātparyamavadhāryate tadā sa eva rañjakatayālaṃkāratāmārohatīti ‘kathaṃ na’ syātkatthanaṃ guṇībhāva iti, tadidaṃbhuktam—syādalaṃkāra eveti | kuto labhyate pathika srastaraḥ śastarataṃ cātra grāmaṇīgṛhe | grāmaṇīrgrāmapradhānam | unnatapayodharānmedhān payodharau stanau vā dṛṣṭvā yadi vasasi tadvasa | atra praṣṭuḥ saṃdehajanakatvena nibhṛtānurāgaprakāśanaṃ pathikaviṣaye pratīyate || dvyarthairiti | taduktam—‘vdyarthaiḥ padaiḥ piśunayecca rahasyavastu’ iti ||
vākye prabandhe cārthānāṃ paurvāparyaviparyayaḥ |
doṣaḥ sopakramo nāma citrahetau ca duṣyati || 140 ||
yathā—
‘paścātparyasya kiraṇānudīrṇaṃ candramaṇḍalam |
prāgeva hariṇākṣīṇāmudīrṇo rāgasāgaraḥ || 182 ||’
atra paurvāparyaviparyayādapakramadoṣasya candrodayaṃ prati rāgoddīpanaprakarṣaprakāśanatvādadoṣaḥ ||
vākya iti | arthānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāṃ teṣāmeva paurvāparyaniyamādya iti pūrvārdhe 'dhyāhāryam | citrahetāviti prasiddharūpaviparyāsena hetuvacanadvārā prakṛtavākyārthaparipoṣādhānaṃ citrahetuḥ | paryasya vistārya candrodayarāgoddīpanayoḥ satyapi hetuhetumadbhāvena paurvāparye prathamaṃ rāgasāgaraḥ paścāccandramaṇḍalamudīrṇamiti viparyāsapratītisamasamayamuddīpanavibhāvanānusaṃdhānād himāṃśoratiśīghrakāritāprakāśanāt prakṛtaśṛṅgāraraso dīpyate | evaṃ kulakādirūpaṃ prabandhāntargatavākyeṣvapi guṇatvamavaseyam ||
yasmin‍rīteranirvāhaḥ khinnaṃ tadabhidhīyate |
na doṣastasya tu kvāpi yatra cchāyā na hīyate || 141 ||
yathā—
‘abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapā- dasaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ |
galitavibhavasyājñevādya dyutirmasṛṇā rave- rvirahivanitāvakraklaibyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ || 183 ||’
atropamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ samasyanta iti prakrāntarīteranirvāhe 'pi samāsavyākhyāparatvenaiva ivaśabdataddhitayoḥ prayoge pratyuta cchāyotkarṣa iti guṇatvam ||
yasminniti | vākyārthasya dharmiṇo yadalaṃkārabhaṅgyā prakramasthayā nirvahaṇābhāvaḥ khedaḥ | sa tu pūrvālaṃkāraviśrāntau pratīteraskhalane na doṣaḥ | guṇatvaṃ ca tasya bhaṅgyantarairapi prakṛtālaṃkāre dhvananāt | tathā hi—‘abhinavavadhūroṣasvādu asaralajanāśleṣa iva krūraḥ’ ityupamānāni sāmānyavacanaiḥ samasyanta iti samāsadvayenopamāmupakramya malinavibhavasyājñeveti samāsatyāgādvirahivanitāvakrak‍laibyaṃ bibhartīti cāntaradharmāropeṇa copamātyāgātsatyapi rīteranirvāhe upamāyāmeva paryavasānaṃ samādhānahetuḥ | guṇatvahetumāha—vyākhyāparatveneti | galitavibhāvājñāmasṛṇeti samāse kartavye yo 'yamivaśabdaprayogaḥ sa ivārthe pūrvau samāsau bodhayati | klaibyaṃ
bibhartīti sāmānyālaṃkāre kathamanyadharmamanyo vahatīti pratisaṃdhānasamasamayaṃ vakraklaibyamasyetyantargatopamāprakaṭībhāve upamāsamāsapadayorapi sā pratīyate iti seyaṃ kavicāturīpratīyamānacchāyāmeva puṣṇāti | tadidamuktam—pratyuteti ||
lokātīta ivārthe yaḥ so 'timātra iheṣyate |
vārtādau tena tuṣyanti vidagdhā netare janāḥ || 142 ||
tacca vārtābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsvapi vidyate |
kāntaṃ jagati tatkāntaṃ laukikārthānuyāyi yat || 143 ||
laukikārthamatikramya prasthānaṃ yatpravartate |
tadatyuktiriti proktaṃ gauḍānāṃ manaso mude || 144 ||
yathā—
‘deva dhiṣṇyabhivārādhyamadya prabhṛti no gṛham |
yuṣmatpādarajaḥpātadhautaniḥśeṣakalmaṣam || 184 ||’
atrātimātrākhye doṣe 'pi vārtābhidhāne 'bhidheyasya kāntiguṇasyā- bhyanujñānādga‍uṇatvam |
yathā vā—
‘alpaṃ nirmitamākāśamanālocyaiva vedhasā |
idamevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvi bhavatyāḥ stanajṛmbhaṇam || 185 ||’
atrātimātratve 'pi varṇanārthatvādguṇatvam | athānatimātraṃ kīdṛk |
ucyate—
vārte tāvadyathā—
‘gṛhāṇi nāma tānyeva taporāśirbhavādṛśaḥ |
saṃbhāvayanti yānyevaṃ pāvanaiḥ pādapāṃsubhiḥ || 186 ||’
atha varṇanāyāṃ yathā—
‘anayoranavadyāṅgi stanayorjṛmbhamāṇayoḥ |
avakāśo na paryāptastava bāhulatāntare || 187 ||’
lokāṃtīta iti | ‘anāmaye priyālāpe vārtaṃ vārtā ca kīrtyate | varṇanāsvapi’ ityādipadavivaraṇaṃ dṛśyate | kāntamityabhisaṃbandhaḥ | laukikārthānuyāyi yajjagati loke kāntamucyate tathābhūtamatikramya yatkavīnāṃ prasthānaṃ pravartate tadapi gauḍānāṃ manaso mude proktam | śabdāḍambarātmakagauḍarītipriyāṇāṃ vidagdhakāmājñāpakaṃ sadguṇī bhavatīti ślokārthaḥ | dhiṣṇyaṃ gṛham | nanu priyālāpavarṇanayorevaṃvidhā eva loke kāvye ca vacanasaṃdarbhā iti nāstyatimātratānatimātratayorbheda iti pṛcchati—atheti | sugabhamanyat ||
parūṣaṃ niṣṭhurārthaṃ tu yadatīva vigarhitam |
viruddhalakṣaṇādyāsu taduktiṣu na duṣyati || 145 ||
yathā—
‘hālāhalaṃ viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣva sakhi mā tatra viśvasīḥ |
yadvā na dahyase kāṣṭhaiḥ svalpaistvamiti me matiḥ || 188 ||’
atra pāruṣye 'pi viruddhalakṣaṇayārthāntarasya lakṣitatvādguṇatvam ||
paruṣamiti | viruddhalakṣaṇā laukikī tasyā hi jhaṭityabhidhānāvinābhāvādaparuṣārthapratīterabhidhānataḥ pāruṣyaṃ na doṣo lakṣaṇāparigraheṇa ca guṇatvam | tadāhuḥ—‘abhidheyāvinābhāvapratītirlakṣaṇeti yā | saiṣā kāvye dagdhavakrā jīvitaṃ vṛttiriṣyate ||’ iti |
aprastutarasaṃ prāhurvirasaṃ vastu sūrayaḥ |
aprādhānye tadeṣṭavyaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ syādrasavastunoḥ || 146 ||
yathā—
‘kṣipto hastāvalagna: prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ 'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇankeśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa |
āliṅganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāṃbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ || 189 ||’
atra karuṇe śrṛṅgārasyāprakṛ1tatve 'pi śaṃbhuprabhāvavarṇanāṅgabhūtatvena dvayo- rapyaprādhānyādavairasyena guṇatvam ||
1. ‘stutatve’ iti saṭīkapustakapāṭhaḥ.
aprastuteti | aprādhānya ityupalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyatve 'pīti ca boddhavyam rasavastunoḥ parasparavirodhirasavyañjakayoḥ | yadvā mithovirodhirasarūpayoreva vastunaḥ | tadāha—‘bādhyānāmaṅgabhāvaṃ vā prāptānāmavi‘muktivatsalā’ iti pāṭhaḥmuktatā’ iti ||
hīnaṃ yatropamānaṃ syādupameyaṃ guṇādhikam |
hīnopamaṃ tadasyāhuḥ kavayaḥ kvāpyaduṣṭatām || 147 ||
yathā—
‘tataḥ kumudanāthena kāminīgaṇḍapāṇḍunā |
netrānandena candreṇa māhendrī digalaṃkṛtā || 190 ||’
atropamānasya hīnatāyāmapi rāgātiśayahetutvādguṇatvam ||
hīnamiti | jātipramāṇābhyāmapakṛṣṭaṃ hīnaṃ candrāpekṣayā kāminīkapolasyāpakarṣe ātmanastulyatāmuddīpanasya pratipādyamānaḥ prakṛtaśṛṅgāraprakarṣamarpayiṣyatīti guṇatvam | evamadhikopame 'pi ||
yatropamānamutkṛṣṭamupameyaṃ nikṛṣyate |
jñeyaṃ tadadhikaupamyamasyāpi kvāpyadoṣatā || 148 ||
yathā—
‘kāntyā candramasaṃ dhāmnā sūryaṃ dhairyeṇa cārṇavam |
rājannanukaroṣi tvaṃ saubhāgyenāpi manmatham || 191 ||’
asyādhikaupamye 'pi rājño lokapālāṃśatvena śiṣṭairādṛtatvādguṇatvam ||'
upamānasya‘nena’ iti saṭīkapustakapāṭhaḥ vaiṣamyādbhavedasadṛśopamam |
tasyābhyanujñāmicchanti vyatirekopamādiṣu || 149 ||
yathā—
‘prahitaḥ pradhanāya mādhavānahamākārayituṃ mahībhujā |
na pareṣu mahaujasaśchalādapakurvanti malimlucā iva || 192 ||’
asyāsadṛśopamatve 'pi vyatirekopapādakatvādguṇatvam ||
upamānasyeti | upamānena vaiṣamyamanvayena sādṛśyābhāvāt | vyatirekopamādītyādigrahaṇāvdyatirekadṛṣṭāntottkyādiparigrahaḥ ||
yasyopamānaṃ lokeṣu na prasiddhaṃ tadiṣyate |
aprasiddhopamaṃ nāma tatkvacinnaiva duṣyati || 150 ||
yathā—
‘udgarbhahūṇaramaṇīramaṇopamarda- bhugnonnatastananiveśanibhaṃ himāṃśoḥ |
bimbaṃ kaṭhorabisakāṇḍakaḍāragaurai- rviṣṇoḥ padaṃ prathamamagrakarairvyanaktiḥ || 193 ||’
asthāṃ prasiddhopamatvena dūṣaṇatve 'pi dvayorapi śrṛṅgāroddīpakatvasāmyādguṇatvam ||
yasyopamānamiti | lokaprasiddhameva kavibhirupamāne kāntaṃ bhavati tena yatra loke prasiddhaṃ tena sahopamāvarṇane saṃbhavadapyaprasiddhopamatvaṃ rasānupraveśena guṇī bhavati | udgarbhatvena stanāgraśyāmikā tayā lāñchanānukaraṇamabhilaṣitam ||
niralaṃkāramityāhuralaṃkārojjhitaṃ vacaḥ |
arthaurjityeṣu tasyāpi kvacinnirdoṣatā matā || 151 ||
yathā—
‘yācñāṃ dainyaparābhavapraṇayinīṃ nekṣvākavaḥ śikṣitāḥ sevāsaṃvalitaḥ kadā raghukule maulau nibaddho 'ñjaliḥ |
sarvaṃ tadvihitaṃ tathāpyudadhinā naivoparodhaḥ kṛtaḥ pāṇiḥ saṃprati me haṭhātkimaparaṃ spraṣṭuṃ dhanurvāñchati || 194 ||’
atra niralaṃkāratve 'pi arthaurjityādguṇatvam ||
niralaṃkāramiti | dainyaparābhavapraṇayinīmityādyutkṛṣṭapuṣṭiviśeṣaṇayogādastiśabde 'spaṣṭe vakratārthe tu nāsti vakratvaṃ cālaṃkāra iti | yadyapi vākyārtho niralaṃkāra
iva bhāsate, tathāpi viśeṣato 'laṃkārādhyavasāye 'pi sāmānyena vakratā prakāśata eva | nahi laukikaśāstrīyavacanārthavaiparītyamiha pratīyate | tadidamuktamarthaurjityāditi ||
asti hi vayaṃ yācāmaha ityukte yācñā ca bhikṣākarānālakṣitā(?)ityuktau nāyakaprakarṣābhivyañjako viśeṣa ityāha—
asabhyārthaṃ yadaślīlaṃ tadarthāntaravāci vā |
tasyeha dṛśyate bhūmnā prayogo nāpi duṣyati || 152 ||
yathā—
‘adyāpi tatkanakakuṇḍalaghṛṣṭagaṇḍa- māsyaṃ smarāmi viparītaratābhiyoge |
āndolanaśramajalasphuṭagharmabindu- muktāphalaprakaravicchuritaṃ priyāyāḥ || 195 ||’
atrāślīlārthe 'pi kavibhiravigītatvādguṇatvam ||
asabhyārthamiti | kvacitprāthamika eva padārthasaṃsargo 'ślīlaḥ | kvacittu na tasmiṃstathābhūte 'pi saṃsargāntaramiti yadaślīlamarthāntaravāci vetyuktam | kavibhiravigītatvāditi | aviparītādviparītaṃ ratamutkṛṣyata iti śāstrakārairāmnānāttasya śṛṅgāroddīpanatayā kavibhirādṛtatvādityarthaḥ ||
deśo 'drivanarāṣṭrādiḥ kālo rātriṃdivartavaḥ |
nṛtyagītaprabhṛtayaḥ kalāḥ kāmārthasaṃśrayāḥ || 153 ||
carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ pravṛttirlokasaṃjñitā |
hetuvidyātmako nyāyaḥ saṃsmṛtiḥ śrutirāgamaḥ || 154 ||
teṣu teṣvayathārūḍhaṃ yadi kiṃcitpravartate |
kaveḥ pramādāddeśādivirodhītyetaducyate || 155 ||
virodhaḥ sakaleṣveva‘lo 'pyeṣa’ iti saṭīkapustakapāṭhaḥ kadācitkavikauśalāt |
utkramya doṣagaṇanāṃ guṇavīthīṃ vigāhate || 156 ||
tatra deśaviruddhasya guṇībhāvo yathā—
‘tasya rājñaḥ prabhāveṇa tadudyānāni jajñire |
ārdrāṃśukapravālānāmāspadaṃ suraśākhinām || 196 ||’
atra deśaviruddhatve 'pi tasya rājñaḥ prabhāveṇeti kāraṇopanyāsādguṇatvam ||
deśo 'drīti | ādipadena dvīpādiparigrahaḥ | kāmārthasaṃśrayāḥ, arthasaṃśrayāḥ pravṛttayo 'vasthāviśeṣāḥ | hetuvidyā ānvīkṣikī | ayathārūḍhaṃ aprasiddham ||
kālaviruddhasya yathā—
‘rājñāṃ vināśapiśunaścacāra kharamārutaḥ |
cumbankadambakusumaiḥ saha saptacchadodgamān || 197 ||’
atra kālaviruddhatve 'pi rājñāṃ vināśapiśuna ityaniṣṭasūcakotpāta rūpatvādguṇatvam ||
kālaviruddhasyeti | upaghāta utpātaḥ ||
lokaviruddhasya yathā—
‘aindavādarciṣaḥ kāmī śiśiraṃ havyavāhanam |
abalāvirahakleśavihvalo gaṇayatyalam || 198 ||’
atra lokaviruddhatve 'pi kāmibhistathā saṃvedyamānatvādguṇatvam ||
yuktiviruddhasya yathā—
‘sa saṃkocaścandrādiva kumudarāśeraśaraṇaḥ sa sūryātkokānāṃ viraha iva luptapratividhiḥ |
guṇebhyaste khedapraśamanakarebhyo 'pi yadayaṃ khalānāmudvegastadidamamṛtādeva maraṇam || 199 ||’
atra yuktiviruddhatve 'pi chekottkyā saṃbhāvyamānopamayā tathāpratīterguṇatvam |
sa saṃkoca iti | yadi candrādibhyaḥ kumudasaṃkocādayo bhaveyustadā bhavadguṇebhyaḥ khalānāmudvega upamīyeta na tu tathā saṃbhavati tenāyamalaukikatvādāścaryamarpayatīti vākyārthaparipoṣāttathopanyāso guṇa eveti ||
aucityaviruddhasya yathā—
‘tenātha nātha durudāharaṇātapena saumyāpi nāma paruṣatvamabhiprapannā |
jajvāla tīkṣṇaviśadāḥ sahasodgirantī vāgarciṣastapanakāntaśileva sītā || 200 ||’
atra strītvādaucityavirodhe 'pi tatsamayocitatvādguṇatvam ||
vacanaviruddhasya yathā—
‘paradārābhilāṣo me kathamāryasya yujyate |
pibāmi taralaṃ tasyāḥ kadā nu radanacchadam || 201 ||’
atra vacanavirodhe 'pi vaktustathāvidhāvasthatvādguṇatvam ||
vacanaviruddhasyeti | aṣṭamī kāmāvasthāṃprakṣipto 'yaṃ pāṭhaḥ ||
dharmavirodhasya yathā—
‘pañcānāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ patnī pāñcālakanyakā |
satīnāmagraṇīstvāsīddaivo hi vidhirīdṛśaḥ || 202 ||’
atra dharmavirodhe 'pi daivo vidhirityanenābhihitatvādadoṣaḥ ||
dharmavirodhasyeti | daivo hīti | siddhādeśācca satītvaṃ pāñcālakanyakāyāḥ | tiraskṛtamityata eva vā pañcadhā vivakṣita ityāgamaḥ ||
arthaśāstraviruddhasya yathā—
‘nītirāpadi yadgamyaḥ parastanmānino hriye |
vidhurvidhuṃtudasyeva pūrṇastasyotsavāya saḥ || 203 ||’
atrāpanna: śatrurabhiyātavya iti nītiḥ, tacca mānino hriye bhavatī‘to 'ti’ mūlapustakapāṭhaḥtiviruddhamapi uddhatapuruṣabhāṣitatvānna duṣyatīti guṇatvam |
arthaśāstreti | uddhatapuruṣabhāṣitatvāditi | pūrvapakṣatayā siddhāntopoddhātatvādityarthaḥ ||
kāmaśāstraviruddhasya yathā—
‘dolātipreraṇatrastavadhūjanamukhodgatam |
kāmināṃ layavaiṣamyādgeyaṃ rāgamavardhayat || 204 ||’
atra trāsato layavaiṣamyeṇa geyasya rāgahetutve 'pi kāminīmukhodgīrṇatvādrāgavivardhanatvena guṇatvam ||
kāmaśāstreti | layavaiṣamyāditi gītasya kalāprakathanāttasya ca viṣamalayasyārañjakatvātkathaṃ rāgavardhanamiti dūṣaṇaṃ dolāgatāgatatrastakāminīgītaprabhāvokteścamatkāritvāttirodhīyata iti guṇabhāvaṃ ca nīyate | bhāvāntarālavartī kāmo layaḥ ||
itthaṃ guṇāśca doṣāśca kāvye doṣaguṇāśca ye |
ākhyātāste sphuṭaṃ saṃpratyalaṃkārānpracakṣmahe || 157 ||
nanu guṇaireva śabdārthayoḥ sanāthīkaraṇe kimalaṃkāravivecanaprayāsenetyata āha—
yuvateriva rūpamaṅa‍ga kāvyaṃ svadate śuddhaguṇaṃ tadapyatīva |
vihitapraṇayaṃ nirantarābhiḥ sadalaṃkāravikalpakalpanābhiḥ || 158 ||
yuvateriti | aṅa‍getyākṣepasaṃbodhane | alaṃkārasāhityabuddhisaṃgatiḥ praṇayaḥ ||
vikalpo viśeṣastarhi kimuttarasiddhau pūrveṇeti nyāyena tyajyantāṃ guṇā ityata āha—
yadi bhavati vacaścyutaṃ guṇebhyo vapuriva yauvanabandhamaṅa‍ganāyāḥ |
api janadayitāni durbhagatvaṃ niyatamalaṃkaraṇāni saṃśrayante || 159 ||
yadi bhavatīti | vivṛtametat ||
te cālaṃkārā yathāsthānaṃ niveśyamānā eva sahṛdayarañjanakṣamā iti kavīñśikṣayati—
dīrghāpāṅa‍gaṃ nayanayugalaṃ bhūṣayatyañjanaśrī- stuṅa‍gābhogau prabhavati kucāvarcituṃ hārayaṣṭiḥ |
madhye kṣāme vapuṣi labhate sthānakūrpāsalakṣmīḥ śroṇībimbe guruṇi raśanādāma śobhāṃ bibharti || 160 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājabhojadevena viracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇanāmni alaṃkāraśāstre guṇavivecanaṃ nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
dīrgheti | tena śabdādiviṣayavibhāgenālaṃkāravivecanaṃ saprayojanameveti tātparyārthaḥ | śeṣamatirohitam ||
iti śrīmiśraratneśvaraviracite ratnadarpaṇanāmni sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇa-vivaraṇe guṇavivecano nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
